attractions.about: War Remnants Museum is a unit under the Department of Culture, Sports and Tourism Ho Chi Minh City. Located in the museum system of Vietnam, the museum for world peace and a member of the World Council of Museums (ICOM), the War Remnants Museum, the Museum of thematic research, collection , storage, preservation and display of the material, photographs, artifacts on the evidence of the crime and the consequences of the war that the invasion force has caused to Vietnam.Museum store more than 20,000 documents, exhibits and films, in which more than 1,500 documents, artifacts, films have been applied to introduce in eight thematic exhibition frequently. In 35 years, the Museum has welcomed over 15 million visitors at home and abroad. Currently with about 500,000 visitors each year, the War Remnants Museum is one of the only cultural tourism to attract high public credibility at home and abroad.
attractions.address: 28 Vo Van Tan Ward 6, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
attractions.name: War Remnants Museum

attractions.about: Bitexco Financial Tower at a height of 262 meters is the tallest building in Ho Chi Minh City up to date. With design concept is taken from the shape of a lotus bud, the Vietnam national flower, Bitexco Financial Tower is not merely a building which is covered in glass and steel, but also a symbol of beauty and the rapid development of Ho Chi Minh City economy, a key economic region in Vietnam. Bitexco Financial Tower is a typical example for creativity and unique design. One of the tower highlights is the first observation in the city at 49th floors. Saigon Skydeck has opened for all visitors from January 1, 2011. With a full range of services and facilities for visitors, the Skydeck has officially opened to welcome visitors both domestic and international visitors since July, 2011. Visitors have the opportunity to visit Saigon Skydeck, not only enjoy the full sight of the Ho Chi Minh City and Saigon River, but also have the chance to use the facilities and services at this Skydeck. With many activities will be held at the Skydeck during this year, with special offer prices for different customer groups, the Skydeck will be an attractive destination in the journey of Ho Chi Minh City's for both domestic and international tourists.
attractions.address: 36 Ho Tung Mau Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Bitexco Financial Tower

attractions.about: À Ố Show is one of Vietnamese Bamboo Circus performances. À Ố - derives from Làng Phố, which means ‘village and city’. À Ố Show tells a captivating story of the transition from the peaceful life of the countryside to the fast-paced metropolitan life of modern Southern Vietnam. The soul of village life and, in stark contrast, familiar scenes from the city, are beautifully brought to life -- with bamboo! The stunning simplicity of the bamboo props frames an awe-inspiring circus featuring acrobatics, contortion, juggling, and stunting. Throughout the show, both traditional and modern music harmonize richly, performed live with 17 musical instruments. À Ố Show has become a world-renowned circus, critically acclaimed in 11 countries.
attractions.address: 7 Cong Truong Lam Son District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
attractions.name: A O Show - Lune Production

attractions.about: Generations ago, Vietnamese puppeteers performed for their rural communities in waist-deep water, bringing to life legends and stories about their region. Water puppetry theaters like Golden Dragon Water Puppet Theater continue that tradition into the modern day and are a fun, family-friendly way to experience a hallmark of traditional Vietnamese culture.water puppet show, which is closely associated with the spiritual life of Vietnamese people, especially in the countryside. The show’s chosen stage is the surface of a water pool. The puppeteers present their clever skills in managing puppets by long bamboo rods and string mechanism under the surface. A traditional Vietnamese orchestra is an excellent music accompaniment. The puppets depict the story from the songs during the show, which reflects the peaceful life of the Vietnamese countryside, so it is not too difficult to understand it.
attractions.address: 55B Nguyen Thi Minh Khai District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Golden Dragon Water Puppet Theater

attractions.about: Built in 1898 following the “flamboyant” style of the French 3rd Republic, Saigon Opera House was certified a National Relic & one of the top Ho Chi Minh City attractions. The Opera House hosts cultural entertaining performances, bamboo cirque, contemporary dance, orchestra concerts and government events. Come to the front gate to check availability and ticket to a performance in this iconic building.
attractions.address: 07 Lam Son Square Street District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Saigon Opera House (Ho Chi Minh Municipal Theater)

attractions.about: “From Norodom Palace to Independence Palace 1868-1966” explores the century-long history of the building that once served as the seat of the French colonial government in Cochinchina. In 1954, this building was renamed Independence Palace. It subsequently witnessed many dramatic episodes in the rise and decline of the government of Ngo Dinh Diem, the founding leader of the Republic of Vietnam

stays.name: LOTTE HOTEL SAIGON
stays.address: 2A - 4A Ton Duc Thang St, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
stays.about: Fronting the scenic Saigon River and only 3-5 minute walk to famous Opera House, Dong Khoi Street and Le Thanh Ton Street for shopping, dining and entertainment, LOTTE HOTEL SAIGON, the most beloved 5-star hotel in Ho Chi Minh City, combines natural beauty and sheer opulence to provide the best for the discerning traveler. The breathtaking resort-setting and its distinctive architectural interior gives a feeling of luxury and tranquility. A legendary hotel inherits good and ancient Vietnam with garden falls, pond and fountain. The top pattern of the bronze drum, symbol of the sun, from ancient times, frames the entrance of guest rooms. The twelve horary signs in the atrium, the lobby surrounded by colonnades and the giant horse sculptures all of which induce you to meander in the space of the hotel.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Vinpearl Luxury Landmark 81
stays.address: 720A Dien Bien Phu Street Ward 22, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Vinpearl Luxury Landmark 81 Ho Chi Minh City, with 223 rooms and suites, is spectacularly located in the high-end mixed-use Landmark 81, which at over 460m and 81 storeys high is Vietnam’s tallest skycrapper and one of the world’s top 14 tallest buildings, with luxury-brand interiors; set within the “green miniature city” of Vinhomes Central Park.

stays.name: Liberty Central Saigon Citypoint Hotel
stays.address: 59 - 61 Pasteur Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Join us to experience the essence of Saigon city life at Liberty Central Saigon CityPoint as the perfect base to explore, meet and enjoy nightlife as well as business in Ho Chi Minh City. Only 8km from Tan Son Nhat International Airport, our hotel is located mere steps from Le Loi Boulevard, and within walking distance of the central business district, nightlife and the main points of interest.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: The Reverie Saigon
stays.address: 22-36 Nguyen Hue Boulevard & 57-69F Dong Khoi Street District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: The Reverie Saigon is a luxury hotel in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Renowned for its beautiful interior designs, The Reverie Saigon also raises the bar for services and accommodations in Vietnam. Crafted to perfection, indulge in one of the 12 types of magnificently furnished accommodation as offered throughout 62 suites and 224 rooms. The highest hotel in Ho Chi Minh City, rooms and suites start from the 27th floor with beautiful panoramic views overlooking the central business district and the winding Saigon River through floor-to-ceiling windows. Interiors are curated by some of Italy’s most recognised furnishings design brands – including, amongst others, Colombostile, Giorgetti, Poltrona Frau Group and Visionnaire – with styles ranging from chic modern to classical European, from whimsically romantic to fanciful and sophisticated.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Vy Khanh Guesthouse
stays.address: 241/11/6 Pham Ngu Lao street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
stays.about: It's located (safe place)at backpacker's area (district 1), 2 minutes to WALKING BUI VIEN STREEET but the guesthouse is still staying away the noisy from there. 20 minutes walking to Independece Palace and War Museum, and walking distance to all activities (walking 7 minutes to Ben Thanh market), near bank, park,museums, zoo, coffee shops yet it's quiet enough since it situated in an alley. All rooms are equipped with air conditioners, portable fan, private bath with heated water, mini fridge, cable TV, wifi internet (free). Friendly staff, relaxing atmosphere, and home stay at a reasonable price. You will be comfortable and safe staying at our place.

stays.name: The Myst Dong Khoi
stays.address: 6-8 Ho Huan Nghiep St., Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: The Myst Dong Khoi inhabits tree-lined Hồ Huấn Nghiệp Street, near the gently flowing waters of the Sông Sài Gòn, and steps from famous Đồng Khởi Street – the fashionable commercial heart of Saigon since colonial times. You’re free to meander along the riverfront, or head to the Opera House, to Notre-Dame Cathedral or to Independence Palace. Or heed the call of Nguyen Hue Walking Street with all its bars and boutiques. Venturing deeper into Saigon’s various districts, you uncover the city’s vibrant contrasts. Colonial architecture stands beside modern skyscrapers; tranquil avenues guide the way to the bustling Bến Thành Market. Experience the rich red hues of Chinatown and the verdant greens of towering dầu trees. Or just search the city’s sidewalks and tangled alleyways, navigating the calls of street vendors, the whiz of bikes and the welcoming scent of fresh coffee.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Sofitel Saigon Plaza
stays.address: 17 Le Duan Boulevard District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
stays.about: Sofitel Saigon Plaza is located on peaceful tree-lined Le Duan Boulevard just a moment from the city's commercial centre with it's fabulous shopping dining and landmark attractions like Notre Dame Cathedral and Reunification Palace. Newly renovated rooms and suites offer guests contemporary 5-star hotel style with a blend of modern French design and Vietnamese influences. Each room features spacious elegance while the Imperial Suite is the largest in Saigon. Situated in the business district and offering a full range of expert services the hotel is ideal for business as well as leisure travellers to Ho Chi Minh. It's conference facilities make it a preferred host for Magnifique weddings and events. Experience the French art de vivre the best of Ho Chi Minh City and gracious 5-star hotel service at Sofitel Saigon Plaza.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Silverland Charner Hotel
stays.address: 87-89-91 Ho Tung Mau Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Discover the stories of Saigon's captivating past at Silverland Charner, a stylish hideaway nestled in the city's historic heart. Inspired by the teahouses of the French colonial era, Silverland Charner is a charming blend of old and new Saigon, where every space brings the spirit of Indochine to life.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Icon Saigon - Luxury Design Hotel
stays.address: 65-67 Hai Ba Trung Ben Nghe, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to your home away from home at the heart of Ho Chi Minh City ! Located in the centre of the Dong Khoi and Saigon river area, the Icon Saigon Hotel provides its guests with excellent services and stylish rooms. Let us take you into the world of wonderful design and choose your favorite room type among the Vietnamese culture of our charming unique boutique hotel.

stays.name: Hotel Continental Saigon
stays.address: 132-134 Dong Khoi Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to Hotel Continental Saigon, your Ho Chi Minh City “home away from home.” Hotel Continental Saigon aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Ho Chi Minh City, Continental Hotel is located a short distance from Nguyen Hue Street (0.2 mi) and The World of Heineken (0.4 mi).Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning, and Continental Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a concierge and room service. In addition, guests can enjoy a fitness center and free breakfast during their visit.While visiting Ho Chi Minh City, you may want to try some tapas at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Cuc Gach Quan, Bun Cha 145 Bui Vien, or Shri Restaurant & Lounge.Ho Chi Minh City is also known for some great government buildings, including Central Post Office, The Independence Palace, and Saigon Opera House (Ho Chi Minh Municipal Theater), which are not too far from Hotel Continental Saigon.Hotel Continental Saigon puts the best of Ho Chi Minh City at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Duc Vuong Hotel
stays.address: 195 Bui Vien St, Pham Ngu Lao ward, Dist 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Duc Vuong Hotel Situated on Bui Vien Street, Dist 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam. Duc Vuong Hotel is one of the busiest tourists place where thousands of people from all over the world visit each year. Duc Vuong Hotel has easy access to many tourists attraction around the City. Duc Vuong Hotel was established in 2006 with 20 rooms, and thanks to our wonderful guests and excellent attentive staff, we have now proudly expanded our family friendly Hotel to 51 beautiful rooms. We also have added an additional location in District 10.Duc Vuong Hotel's goal is to ensure our guests always have a memorable and enjoyable travel experience. Our friendly and caring staff is here to serve you and we are more then happy to assist and arrange additional requests for special occasions such as birthdays, anniversaries, celebrations and also any other group meetings or parties. We are family! Duc Vuong's unique, charming and peaceful Garden Terrace restaurant & Lounge, offers a serene place to relax in comfort, after a long day of site seeing and enjoying your experience in our exciting and busy city. Duc Vuong's Garden Terrace restaurant & lounge is a quiet place for you to enjoy a relaxing and delicious, fresh and memorable meal, hors d'oeuvres and delectable unique drinks, all prepared with care by our phenomenal bartender and chef. This is also a brilliant place to view the sunrise, sunset and of course the very radiant moonlight! You will be amazed at the stunning view from high above the busy streets while experiencing the city lights and radiant moonlight The spacious, inviting visitors lounge always has fresh flowers, fruit and hot tea for you and your guests to enjoy.

stays.name: Mia Saigon Luxury Boutique Hotel
stays.address: 2-4 Street No. 10 An Phu Ward, District 2, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Set on the banks of the tranquil Saigon River in the trendy District 2. Mia Saigon - Luxury Boutique Hotel is just minutes from Ho Chi Minh City’s dynamic downtown. Mia Saigon’s 35 spacious rooms and 17 sumptuous suites with private balcony overlooking the serene Saigon River. In this hotel, you will find a fine dining restaurant, a brasserie, cigar lounge, a spa and swimming pool.

stays.name: Rex Hotel
stays.address: 141 Nguyen Hue Blvd District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
stays.about: Strategically located at the best of downtown Saigon, the Rex Hotel is a luxury 5 stars hotel heritage dating back to early 20th century when it was originally opened as a French garage. For over 80 years, as a landmark, as well as a witness of the ups and downs of the city's history, the Rex Hotel was rebuilt to become one of the city's most incredible addresses. It prides itself to offer guests many high-class facilities including 286 individually designed guestrooms, a range of function & meeting room's ideal for wedding, business or events, the La Cochinchine spa, and four in-house restaurants, cafe and bar.

stays.about: Old-world elegance meets chic modern comfort at Mai House Saigon, transporting you back to the glamorous days of luxury, when service was all about style and style was all that mattered. Gorgeous French-Indochinese design and charming colonial flair open the doors to plush interiors and beautifully appointed guestrooms, suites and serviced apartments.

Well-known for its budget friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Chill Suites makes it easy to enjoy the best of Ho Chi Minh City.Rooms at Chill Suites offer air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.While staying at Chill Suites, visitors can check out Pham Ngu Lao Street (0.4 mi) and Benthanh Street Food Market (0.8 mi), some of Ho Chi Minh City's top attractions.While in Ho Chi Minh City be sure to experience local poutine favorites at Soul Burger.If you are interested in exploring Ho Chi Minh City, check out one of the art galleries, such as Couleurs by Rehahn Fine Art Photography, Artinus 3D Art Museum, and Aitch Space.Chill Suites is sure to make your visit to Ho Chi Minh City one worth remembering.

We have 89 inviting guestrooms, catering to business and leisure guests from all backgrounds. Our delightful Western, Asian and Vietnamese breakfast buffet is the perfect start to an exciting day in the city. Meanwhile, our front desk staff are happy to help with any questions or concerns guests may have. Whether it is guidance to cross the busy streets, directions to a famed relic or a restaurant recommendation, we are here to help.

stays.name: Homestead Parkview
stays.address: 149-151 Nguyen Du St, Ben Thanh Ward, Dist.1 Ben Thanh Market, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Hiding from Tao Dan Park, Homestead Parkview, formerly Compass Parkview is parallel with the green lines of Tamarinds along Nguyen Du Road. Homestead Parkview is a condo building with a fully serviced- apartment will be an ideal for those who would like to vacation, work and live in Ho Chi Minh City. Well decoration in a homely style, Homestead Parkview accommodates a homely accommodation and signature services in the desirable area of District one. Each Apartment includes convenient kitchenette, spacious bathroom, living- room, coffee table, comfortable bed, giant closet, safety- box, privately wireless & wired internet etc. All apartments face to wonderful views of Tao Dan Park and the hustle city that enhances the fresh atmosphere creating a signature of Homestead Parkview Just some steps to get to Ben Thanh market, Water Puppet Show, famous places such as Reunification Palace, Notre Dame Cathedral, Central Post Office, War Remnant Museum, Backpacker Areas, etc. Our Parkview Restaurant is one of the signatures of Homestead Parkview. A terrace with a beautiful view, a blanket of green is extending right the heart of city center. A perfect view for perfect meals nowhere else to be but Homestead Parkview. Parkview Restaurant is a perfect combination of Vietnamese and Western Cuisines. Relaxing in Jacuzzis on the roof top, there is a picturesque of the center city is right your see. Or lying on the wooden lounge chairs, refreshing yourself to listen to the wind whispering under the bright sky with the park in front of your eye it feels like you are in the green. Homestead Parkview honorably accommodates your best choice to experience your life time in Ho Chi Minh City. Without hesitating, would you please enjoy with us in Homestead Parkview- Home away from Home.

stays.about: Looking for a place to stay in Ho Chi Minh City? Then look no further than Erato Boutique Hotel, a budget friendly hotel that brings the best of Ho Chi Minh City to your doorstep.Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning, and Erato Boutique Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, 24 hour check-in, and baggage storage. As an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Chua Vinh Nghiem (1.8 mi) and Tan Dinh Church (2.3 mi), guests of Erato Boutique Hotel can easily experience some of Ho Chi Minh City's most well known attractions.Travelers looking for Mediterranean restaurants can head to Jardin Des Sens Restaurant, The Bawa's Grill, or Cai Thung Go Ltd. Co.If you’re looking for something to do, The Independence Palace, People's Committee Building, and Cholon Mosque are a nice way to spend some time.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Erato Boutique Hotel as you experience everything Ho Chi Minh City has to offer.

stays.about: Victory Airport Hotel is situated in the Tan Binh district of Ho Chi Minh City. This 3-star hotel features free high Speedtest WIFI, free parking and a 24-hour front desk. Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 0.8 km from the property. Ben Thanh Market is 6 km from Victory Airport Hotel; War museum is 5 km Giac Lam Pagoda is 6 km away and China Town is 7km away, Giac Vien is 7km. It locates in prime business location and is very walkable to the airport, public transportation, restaurants, cafes and convenient stores. Yet the hotel is on aside street, so it is very quiet and safe. The room are spacious, moderately equipped with LED TV (vietnames and English channels), AC, mini bar, hair dryers, tempurpedic mattress, down alternative pillows, blankets and 500ct 100% cotton linen.

stays.about: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Ho Chi Minh City, New Space Hotel is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its budget friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants, New Space Hotel makes it easy to enjoy the best of Ho Chi Minh City.The rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.New Space Hotel features a 24 hour front desk, 24 hour check-in, and room service. In addition, as a valued New Space Hotel guest, you can enjoy breakfast that is available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to parking.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Chua Vinh Nghiem (1.8 mi) and Tan Dinh Church (2.3 mi), guests of New Space Hotel can easily experience some of Ho Chi Minh City's most well known attractions.If you are looking for a good seafood restaurant, you may want to check out The Chopsticks Saigon Restaurant, Mam Vietnamese Restaurant, or Cau Ba Quan while staying at New Space Hotel.During your visit, be sure to check out popular art museums like Artinus 3D Art Museum, Fine Arts Museum, and The Factory Contemporary Arts Centre, which are all a short distance from the small hotel.New Space Hotel is sure to make your visit to Ho Chi Minh City one worth remembering.

cities.name: Ho Chi Minh City
cities.info: As Vietnam’s largest economic center and cultural capital, Ho Chi Minh City boasts soaring skyscrapers that tower over charming French colonial structures and traditional pagodas from Saigon’s yesteryear. Past the bustling streets and dizzying traffic, uncover the delicious street food, booming nightlife and historical landmarks that give this city its distinct appeal. Visit The War Remnants Museum for a glimpse into the Vietnam War, wander down Bui Vien Street for cheap beer or cruise through the Mekong Delta for sprawling views of paddy fields and houseboats.

attractions.about: Art in Paradise Danang is the first 3D Trick Art Museum in Danang and the largest one in Viet Nam. Come to the museum, you will be suprised by hundreds of 3D art works. They were all drawn and painted by hand that used three-dimensional and scientific method combinations to make the paintings look realistic and live, and you can be part of them. It's not just an art, but a paradise. You will have a lot of happy memories with your family and friends here. Love!
attractions.name: 3D Museum Art in Paradise Danang

attractions.about:
The Da Nang Museum of Cham Sculpture is one of the first museums built in Vietnam by the French. The main building was constructed in 1915. It evokes some motifs of French colonial architecture in the early twentieth century and resembles the image of the Champa temples - towers in Central Viet Nam. 

Visitors will have the opportunity to contemplate more than 400 artifacts on display, including National Treasures and others representing the masterpieces of Champa sculpture in ten centuries (from 5th to 15th). The artifacts were made in a variety of materials, such as sandstone, terracotta, and metal. Grounded in various themes from fertility symbols, deities, mythical animals and architectural decoration from the Hindu and Buddhist, they express the features of cultural and religious values of the Champa people over many generations. 

The Da Nang Museum of Cham Sculpture is a must-see destination for visitors wishing to discover the culture and heritage of Central Viet Nam.
attractions.name: Da Nang Museum of Cham Sculpture

attractions.about: Da Nang Fine Arts Museum was founded on July 29, 2014 as a representative of the Central Region and Highlands to preserve, introduce and promote the values of the artistic heritage in the area. Located in the center of Da Nang City, at 78 Le Duan Street, Thach Thang Ward, Hai Chau District, Da Nang Fine Arts Museum is currently preserving and displaying a collection of about 1000 works of modern arts and traditional handicrafts in a three-floor exhibition with a total area of 1,185.5 m2. On the first floor, there is a reception, a theme exhibition area and an arts learning space for children. On the second floor, you can see a permanent exhibition that showcases modern art works which cover a wide range of materials, media such as oil, lacquer, silk, graphics and sculptures and so forth. On the third floor, it features a display of traditional folk arts and handicraft artifacts of Da Nang and the Central Region and Highlands as well.

stays.name: Monarque Hotel
stays.address: 238 Vo Nguyen Giap, Phuoc My, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
stays.about: All travellers seem to be fall in love Da Nang city from the first time they arrive. Da Nang not only impresses visitors with dynamic image, always full of vitality, but also is attracted by the poetic natural beauty, enchanting with immense sky and sea and mountains. When traveling, we can't help mentioning the paradise of convalescence in this beautiful city and the MONARQUE HOTEL is one of them. With 75 elegantly designed rooms with unique neoclassical style with a slightly European orientation, new modern rooms will bring you an unforgettable experience here. The rooftop swimming pool is also a highlight of Monarque when you can just soak in the clear blue water while watching the panoramic view of My Khe beach - the beach voted by Forbes magazine as one of 10 charming beaches on the planet. In addition, the service from the room to the restaurant, spa, swimming pool will bring you great experiences in Da Nang. It only takes 2 minutes to walk from the hotel to My Khe beach, 6km to the airport, 2.2km to Han Market. cities.name: Da Nang
cities.info: No other city represents Vietnam's boom better than Da Nang. It's become a gleaming, modern tourist magnet, complete with condos, theme parks, and brand-new resorts. But the city's earlier charm is still present, including laid-back, friendly locals and incredible street eats. After you’ve stuffed yourself with a bowl of Mi Quang and Banh Mi Ba Lan, walk it off by exploring the limestone caves and Buddhist grottos of the Marble Mountains. Make an escape to the surreal mountain resort of Ba Na Hills, where the majestic Golden Bridge welcomes you with open palms.

attractions.about: Hanoi’s lively Old Quarter comprises nearly 40 streets packed with shops selling all kinds of goods, each street named for its primary good or service.
attractions.name: Old Quarter

attractions.about: All you need to step foot in the door.
attractions.name: Temple of Literature & National University

attractions.about: Vietnam Museum of Ethnology is a unit under Vietnam Academy of Scocial Sciences. Vietnam Museum of Ethnology is both a research centre and a public museum exhibiting the ethnic groups of Vietnam. The mission of the Museum is scientific research, collection, documentation, conservation, exhibition and preserving the cultural and historic patrimony of the nation's different ethnic groups. The museum also serves to guide research, conservation, and technology that are specific to the work of an ethnographic museum.
attractions.name: Vietnam Museum of Ethnology

attractions.about: Focused on the contribution of women to Vietnam's history and culture, this museum highlights their roles in Vietnam's many military conflicts as well as in commerce, including features on female street vendors, women's role in the family, and more recently, single mothers in Vietnam.
attractions.name: Vietnamese Women's Museum

attractions.about: Colloquially known as "Hanoi Hilton," this famous prison has been mostly torn down. A museum occupies the remaining structure.
attractions.name: Hoa Lo Prison

attractions.about: A rare breed of turtle enjoys this popular lake almost as much as countless locals and tourists. Hoan Kiem Lake is a dynamic daily tableau, from morning walks amid locals doing exercises on the shore, to young couples water-gazing on park benches, to the multiple shopping and sight-seeing opportunities in the vicinity.  Centrally located in the city, Hoan Kiem Lake serves as a massive home base, and provides endless people-watching and recreational opportunities on the edge of the Old Quarter.
attractions.name: Lake of the Restored Sword (Hoan Kiem Lake)

attractions.about: The Long Bien bridge across the Red River connects Hanoi with the main port of Haiphong. Designed by Gustave Eiffel, the bridge sustained significant damage during the Vietnam War. Only half of the bridge retains its original shape, but a rebuilding project supported by the French government is currently in progress to restore the bridge to its original appearance.
attractions.name: Long Bien Bridge

attractions.about: Resembling the Opéra Palais Garnier, Hanoi Opera House, built in 10 years since 1911 by two French architects. The magnificent building became one of the top landmarks in Hanoi. The Opera House hosts cultural entertaining performances, bamboo cirque, contemporary dance, orchestra concerts and government events. Come to the front gate to check availability and ticket to a performance in this iconic building.
attractions.name: Hanoi Opera House

attractions.about: The Lotte Observation Deck is on the 65F, 267m high from the ground with large space.We have the Photo Zone in B1F, the Photo Counter and the Photo at Skywalk in the 65F so you can taking and buying photo, including photo frame. The Media Gallery is exciting, including Inner U&I machine to test the romantic degree for couple. We also have the Lotteria and Angel In Us Coffee
attractions.name: Lotte Observation Deck

attractions.about: Entering this majestic church is like walking into 1886, as little has changed since it first opened its doors.
attractions.name: St. Joseph's Cathedral

attractions.about: This museum was opened in 1966. Though in need of updating, some interesting artifacts are on display in its three floors organized chronologically.
attractions.name: Fine Arts Museum (Bao Tang My Thuat)

attractions.about: **This place is temporarily closed** Every year many thousands of respectful citizens and tourists visit the final resting place of the country’s most notable historic figure.
attractions.name: Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum

attractions.about: Chùa Trấn Quốc (or Tran Quoc Pagoda) is located beside the dazzling West Lake, on Thanh Nien Road, Hanoi. Particularly, it is seated on an island linked by a bridge to the causeway between the two most romantic lakes of Hanoi: West Lake and Truc Bach Lake.
attractions.name: Chua Tran Quoc

attractions.about: Wellcome to Ho Chi Minh Museum! President Ho Chi Minh - Vietnamese hero of national liberation and great man of culture. After he passed away on September 2nd 1969, in compliance with the Vietnamese people’s aspiration, the Communist Party of Vietnam’s Politburo decided to build the Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum and the Ho Chi Minh Museum. After 20 years of preparing and building, the Ho Chi Minh Museum was inaugurated on September 2nd 1990, on the occasion of the 100th birthday of the President. Ho Chi Minh Museum has more than 170,000 decuments, objects and films about President Ho Chi Minh’s life and revolutionary work. They are invaluable assets of the Vietnamese people in educating patriotism, studying and following Ho Chi Minh’s thought and moral quallties; and encouraging the Vietnamese generations to succeed failthfully and excellently his great revolutionary work.
attractions.name: Ho Chi Minh Museum

attractions.about: This repository of Vietnam's military history includes rooms full of war propganda, photographs and documents from wars against China, France, and the United States. The grounds feature several captured aircraft as well as a central structure build from the wreckage of French and American planes. Visitors may climb the flag tower, with great views from the top.
attractions.name: Vietnam Military History Museum

attractions.about: Welcome to the Imperial Citadel of Thang Long – Hanoi! Situated at the heart of Hanoi, the Central Sector of the Imperial Citadel of Thang Long is an outstanding place of interest not only for the capital city but also for the country as a whole. The site is one of the ten special national heritage sites proclaimed by the Prime Minister in 2009 and was inscribed on the World Heritage List by UNESCO’s World Heritage Committee in 2010. Its Outstanding Universal Values are reflected in its historical longevity, its continuous role as a seat of power, and its multiple cultural layers. The World Heritage Site comprises two sections: the archaeological site at 18 Hoang Dieu Street and the central axis of the Nguyen Dynasty’s Citadel of Hanoi, which together create an integrated heritage complex. This was the most important sector of Thang Long Citadel, the capital of Dai Viet under the Ly, Tran, and Le dynasties from the 11th to the 18th centuries. It was also the core of the earlier Dai
attractions.name: Imperial Citadel of Thang Long

attractions.about: Duong Lam is a commune of Son Tay town, Hanoi, Vietnam. Duong Lam becomes the first ancient village in Vietnam. Two of Vietnam’s kings, Phung Hung (761-802) and Ngo Quyen (896-944) were born in Duong Lam, giving the village its prestige. Both men led resistance wars against northern invasion and after winning national independence, were crowned kings. After their deaths, the local people built tem
attractions.name: Duong Lam Ancient Village

attractions.about: Explore different ways to experience this place.
attractions.name: Hanoi Ceramic Mosaic Mural

attractions.about: This house in the Old Quarter was restored in 1999, as an example of an ancient Hanoian home. It represents the architecture of the Old Quarter, and is decorated to reflect ancient houses of Hanoi.
attractions.name: Ancient House

attractions.about: Located in Ba Vi Mountain Range, about 60 kilometers to the west of Hanoi, Ba Vi National Park, originally a French hill station, is considered as a fascinating destination for a weekend getaway. With a total area of over 10,000 hectares, Ba Vi National Park has everything to offer, from an amazingly biodiverse area of tourist resorts, a string of mysterious French ruins to a host of intriguing mini-hikes and trekking trails.
attractions.name: Ba Vi National Park

attractions.about: The largest lake n Hanoi is a popular spot for gathering, surrounded by many shops, restaurants, gardens, and hotels. It features the Trấn Quốc Pagoda, Vietnamese for "Stabilizing the Nation."
attractions.name: West Lake

attractions.about: Explore different ways to experience this place.
attractions.name: Presidential Palace Historical Site

attractions.about: Vietnamese heritage preservation. Top Vietnamese cultural identical tour to the past within a few hours.
attractions.name: Thanh Chuong's Viet Palace

attractions.about: Explore different ways to experience this place.
attractions.name: Perfume Pagoda

attractions.about: Explore different ways to experience this place.
attractions.name: Ta Hien Street

attractions.about: The One Pillar Pagoda (Vietnamese: Chua Mot Cot, formally Dien Huu tu 延祐寺 or Lien Hoa Dai 蓮花臺) is a historic Buddhist temple in Hanoi, the capital of Vietnam. It is regarded alongside the Perfume Temple, as one of Vietnam's two most iconic temples.

stays.name: The Hanoi Club Hotel & Residences
stays.address: 76 Yen Phu Street Tay Ho District, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: Situated on the banks of Hanoi's largest lake, the West Lake, The Hanoi Club Hotel & Residences offers a first-class accommodation with uninterrupted panoramic views. The luxurious property provides professional service in a relaxing atmosphere with a long list of facilities which include fitness center, Bonus Club Jackpot and Gaming Center, Panda Kid's Club and Arena Golf Driving Range, making it a perfect rendezvous spot for either business or casual get-together. Aside from the hotel facilities, in-room amenities are also arranged to ensure you a comfortable stay. For those looking for an upscale establishment with a wealth of activities and kid-friendly, The Hanoi Club Hotel & Residences makes a perfect solution.

stays.name: Lotte Hotel Hanoi
stays.address: No. 54 Lieu Giai Street Cong Vi Ward, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located between the Old Town and the New Business District, Lotte Hotel Hanoi connects and combines the rich history and the promising future of Hanoi. Situated on the upper part of the magnificent 65-floor building, Lotte Hotel Hanoi proudly represents new standard of international 5-star hotels. In each of the 318 luxurious rooms, you can enjoy the latest-generation facilities and amenities. • 235 Standard rooms and 83 suites with glamorous panoramic view of Hanoi • Vietnamese touch in the interiors designed by HBA and Wilson Associates Our venues are the sophisticated tastes for your elegant souls. Stimulating your palate at our upscale and trendy restaurants and bars while letting the splendid view of downtown Hanoi take your breath away. • Tim Ho Wan - first Michelin starred Dimsum house in Vietnam • Grill 63 - contemporary cuisines, modern steak, and premium wine served by veteran chefs • Pharaoh`s Bar & Upper - the trendy and sassy atmosphere of Hanoi Refresh your mind, rejuvenate your body, and fuel up your energy at the Fitness Center and Evian Spa of Lotte Hotel Hanoi. • The 1,680m2 Fitness Center offers outdoor swimming pool, basketball court, kids play center, and 24-hour gym service. • In Evian Spa, you can immerse yourself into the utter relaxation while enjoying our skillful treatment and unique facilities.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Sofitel Legend Metropole Hanoi
stays.address: 15 Ngo Quyen Street, Trang Tien Ward, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: A prominent fixture in the heart of Hanoi since 1901, French colonial-style Sofitel Legend Metropole Hanoi – with its white façade, green shutters, wrought iron detail, and lush courtyard lawn – portrays an authentic sense of rich heritage, fascinating history and romance. The hotel boasts a long tradition as a popular rendezvous for discerning travelers, among them ambassadors, celebrities, and heads of state. Metropole Hanoi has been the recipient of numerous international awards for its excellent service. Celebrating the passion for great cuisine, the hotel houses a complement of distinctive bars and restaurants, including the bespoke cocktail bar, whisky lounge and restaurant angelina, Parisian café-inspired La Terrasse, haute cuisine Le Beaulieu, and traditional Vietnamese gastronomy Spices Garden.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Hanoi La Siesta Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 94 Ma May St., Old Quarter Hoan Kiem Dist., Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: ABOUT US HANOI LA SIESTA HOTEL & SPAA peaceful hotel with a homely feel, The La Siesta hotel is the newest member of the Hanoi Elegance hotel Group.  Set apart from the rest of our other properties, it embodies pure luxury. Promising a warm welcome and personal service superbly located on old Ma May Street, it is in easy reach of Hanoi's evocative Hoan Kiem lake and major attractions. The latest gem is both modern in style as well as embodying the hidden charm of Hanoi's old quarter.  The hotel has 50 spacious bedrooms, including Suites and Duplex rooms. The Suites have modern and comfortable facilities with seating area. And the duplex rooms are particularly good for families and groups of friends.  Other facilities include a spa, gym, movie room to help you relax even more during your stay with us.For food lovers experience Vietnam's authentic cuisine at the Redbean Restaurant on the ground floor.  Additional thoughtful touches include our 24hour customer service, evening turn-down service, free unlimited wireless internet with PC in every room, cable TV and movies on demand, DVD player...Etc, which we hope will make your stay extra  special. Come and enjoy traditional Vietnamese hospitality in style and comfort and experience our Hanoi Elegance outstanding customer service at La Siesta Hotel.Hanoi La Siesta Hotel & Spa

stays.about: La Sinfonia Del Rey is our first luxury boutique hotel and part of the La Sinfonia hotel and resort group in Vietnam. We’re an oasis of calm right in the center of the vivacious capital, committed to enhancing your experience with curated hotel features and an unbeatable location.

stays.name: Acoustic Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 39 Tho Nhuom Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located in the middle of French Quarter, Ha Noi Old Quarter and governmental area, as well as the famous shopping and entertainment areas, this trendy hotel’s location is ideal for shopping, entertainment and business. With 60 modern and stylishly designed rooms, Acoustic Hotel & Spa has what every discerning traveler is looking for. From its floor to ceiling windows with panoramic views of the sprawling metropolis of Ha Noi to its comfortable ambiance and luxury neo-classical design. The Acoustic Hotel & Spa provides a multitude of drinking and dining options on-site, including Indigo Restaurant, Eclipse Sky Bar – one of the best rooftop bars to view sunset in Ha Noi, ideal for both relaxed yet stylish French dining and a chill out venue for friends to enjoy some fine wines & cocktails.

stays.name: Bao Son International Hotel
stays.address: 50 Nguyen Chi Thanh, Hanoi Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to Bao Son International Hotel, your Hanoi “home away from home.” Bao Son International Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Close to some of Hanoi's most popular landmarks, such as Temple of Literature & National University (1.7 mi) and Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum (1.7 mi), Bao Son International Hotel is a great destination for tourists.Bao Son International Hotel offers guests an array of room amenities including air conditioning, a minibar, and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool and a lounge. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.Hanoi has plenty of Mediterranean restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Bellissimo restaurant, AMATO, and Delisa - Fresh Salad Bar, which are serving up some great dishes.During your visit, be sure to check out Lotte Observation Deck (0.6 mi), which is a popular attraction within walking distance of the hotel.Bao Son International Hotel puts the best of Hanoi at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.address: 12 Nguyen Quang Bich Street, Hoan Kiem District Old Quarter, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: Finding an ideal charming hotel in Hanoi does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy, a nice option for travelers like you.Rooms at Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy provide a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and a minibar, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.In addition, while staying at Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy guests have access to a concierge and room service. You can also enjoy free breakfast.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as St. Joseph's Cathedral (0.3 mi) and Imperial Citadel of Thang Long (0.4 mi), guests of Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy can easily experience some of Hanoi's most well known attractions.If you’re looking for a seafood restaurant, consider a visit to Cha Ca Thang Long, Avalon BBQ Garden, or Old Quarter Street Food Cafe & Cooking Class, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy.Hanoi is also known for some great gardens, including Ly Thai To Park and Botanical Gardens (Vuon Bach Thao), which are not too far from Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy.Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy puts the best of Hanoi at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: AIRA Boutique Hanoi Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 38A Tran Phu Street, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: Nestled in the lush tree-lined boulevard at No. 38A of the charming diplomatic Tran Phu Street, merely few steps from the quaint Hanoi Old Quarter and adjacent to many iconic monuments. The luxury 4+ star AIRA Boutique Hanoi Hotel & Spa is perfectly suited either your upscale business stay, a pampered vacation or a romantic getaway. With 60 luxurious, elegantly appointed rooms, Aira Boutique Hanoi offer a full array of high end services such as 360 degree panoramic view sky bar, award-winning restaurant, bakery & coffee shop, full spa parlor, boutique shop, a gym and all-season infinity pool. The famous Essence restaurant opens full day serving authentic Vietnamese and Japanese cuisine to satisfy your taste buds. Besides, shopping lovers can spend their time at Duccio and Heydi tailoring shops and later indulge in the favourite Essencia Spa, which is designed for rejuvenation and total relaxation. Step off the bustling streets of Hanoi and enter a serene retreat, prepare to be pampered at most.

stays.name: Hyatt Regency West Hanoi
stays.address: 36 Le Duc Tho Street, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located in Nam Tu Liem district, Hanoi’s new business district, near major sporting and convention venues, Hyatt Regency West Hanoi offers a peaceful urban oasis with 519 modern rooms where business travelers and leisure guests can enjoy seamless and relaxing experiences. Hyatt Regency West Hanoi has undergone an extensive renovation throughout all guestrooms, public areas, event and meeting spaces, and culinary venues as well as a redesign of our tranquil landscaped garden, now featuring a waterfall. For guests looking to unwind after a busy day, the sky bar beckons with its relaxed atmosphere and spacious outdoor terrace, where guests can enjoy signature cocktails and panoramic city views. The hotel’s main restaurant, Market Café, offers a vibrant dining experience with its lively open kitchens and separate sections showcasing different types of local and international cuisine, from fresh seafood to Vietnamese fare. The expansive hotel lounge offers a relaxing spot for guests to connect and socialize, with an outdoor terrace overlooking Hanoi city and My Dinh National Stadium.

stays.about: ABOUT EMERALD WATERS HOTEL TRENDY Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Trendy is ideally located on 38 Lo Su Street, and just a stone away from the 1st Emerald Waters Hotel & Spa. The hotel sits along the Hoan Kiem Lake just a few steps away from major attractions, shopping, the night – weekend market and historical landmarks. Our restaurants, the Soybean Restaurant & Cafe, are conveniently located on the 8nd floor. They provide the freshest seafood, authentic Vietnamese cuisine and Western favorites. The added touches of 24 hour customer service, daily turn down service, and free high speed WI-Fi, flat screen TV with cable and DVD will ensure a memorable stay. Upon your arrival to the Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Trendy you will be pampered by our welcoming service and treated to sumptuous delights.

stays.about: If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Hanoi, look no further than Hanoi Graceful Hotel.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Hanoi, Hanoi Amazing Hotel Hotel is located a short distance from St. Joseph's Cathedral (0.4 mi) and Imperial Citadel of Thang Long (0.5 mi).You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and you can stay connected during your stay as Hanoi Amazing Hotel Hotel offers guests free wifi.The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and 24 hour check-in. Plus, Hanoi Graceful Hotel offers free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, parking is available.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Hanoi's popular shrimp restaurants such as Quan An Ngon, Madame Hien Restaurant, and Cau Go Vietnamese Cuisine Restaurant, all a short distance from Hanoi Amazing Hotel Hotel.Looking to explore? Then look no further than Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum (0.8 mi), Old Quarter (0.4 mi), and Hoa Lo Prison (0.6 mi), which are some popular Hanoi attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.The staff at Hanoi Graceful Hotel looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

Taking inspiration of a Hanoian, the hotel is not only have an atmosphere of a traditional old Hanoi, showing clearly through it decor, but also present the spirit of Hanoians through the elegant way of providing service from each one of our staff.

stays.name: Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel
stays.address: 117 Tran Duy Hung Street, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: See why so many travelers make Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel their hotel of choice when visiting Hanoi. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel offer a minibar and air conditioning.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Guests of Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel are also welcome to enjoy a pool and free breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.Nearby landmarks such as Sky 72 Observatory (1.0 mi) and Keangnam Hanoi Landmark Tower (1.9 mi) make Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Hanoi.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Italian restaurants, including 3 Spoons, Kone Cafe, and Paula’s Wines, all of which are a short distance from Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel.There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular history museums such as Vietnam Museum of Ethnology, Ho Chi Minh Museum, and Vietnam National Museum of History.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel as you experience all of the things Hanoi has to offer.

stays.name: Pan Pacific Hanoi
stays.address: 1 Thanh Nien Street Ba Dinh District, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: Pan Pacific Hanoi offers 273 elegantly furnished rooms and suites, which boast breathtaking views of West Lake, Truc Bach Lake and the Red River. The hotel also has an impressive collection of 56 fully equipped serviced suites catering to the needs of extended-stay travellers. Savour a diverse range of international dishes from the all-day-dining restaurant or indulge in exquisite cuisine at our Chinese restaurant. Our lobby bar provides a relaxing ambience for guests to unwind after a long day. With 12 versatile meeting spaces, including a pillarless ballroom that can host up to 450 guests, the hotel provides the ideal venue for corporate meetings and grand banquets. Complete with an indoor pool with natural skylight, well-equipped fitness centre and rejuvenating spa, Pan Pacific Hanoi offers a refreshing new experience in the capital of Vietnam.

stays.address: 44 Hang Bo Old Quarter, Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Ideally located in the central of Hanoi Old Quarter, Little Charm Hanoi Hostel offer a elegent and unique accommodation and restaurant which was designed with Italian style with free wifi access for all the building. Our indoor swimming pool opens year round. Our restaurant and bar open whole day with western and Vietnamese food which are served in a luxury atmostphere.

stays.name: Imperial Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 44 Hang Hanh Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Hanoi Imperial Hotel is located right in the center of Hanoi Old Quarter and only 2-mminute walk to Hoan Kiem Lake. Having good food, drink and shopping just takes some steps from the hotel. It is also very close and convenient to visit the most popular tourist attractions, such as Ngoc Son Temple, Thang Long Water Puppet Theater, St. Joseph Cathedral, Hoa Lo Prison, Temple of Literature, Ho Chi Minh Complex, etc. The hotel has 40 elegant guest rooms with ful equipments and amenities. Most rooms are spacious and have large windows with stunning city view. The staff are courteous and well-trained. The extensive services include 24/24 reception, massage services, concierge, tour desk, airport transfer, car rental, housekeeping, washing and laundry, etc. The breakfast area provides a wide selection of food and panorama of the city in the morning.

stays.name: JW Marriott Hotel Hanoi
stays.address: No 08 Do Duc Duc Road Me Tri Ward, South Tu Liem District, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Rising high above Hanoi's new Central Business District and adjacent to Vietnam National Convention Center, JW Marriott Hotel Hanoi is an inspiring destination in the center of it all. Boasting contemporary design, our business hotel showcases world-class services and curated amenities, catering to the needs of the modern traveler. Treat yourself to rejuvenating spa services, swim in the quiet serenity of our pool or reboot in our 24-hour fitness center. Dine around the world in our renowned restaurants and enjoy live jazz at our club. If a meeting, wedding or social gathering brings you to Hanoi, delight in extensive indoor and outdoor venues, custom catering and five-star service. Relax in the comfort of your luxury room or suite, where floor-to-ceiling windows offer views of Vietnam's capital and the lake. Whether traveling for work or pleasure, look forward to an exceptional stay at JW Marriott Hotel Hanoi.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: PentStudio West Lake Hanoi
stays.address: 699 Lac Long Quan Plot B, Auction Zone D1, Phu Thuong Ward, Tay Ho District, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located within a 21-storey integrated development, PentStudio West Lake Hanoi is a modern building, housing 151 units that come in various size. It is one-of-a-kind residential project designed with a mezzanine floor, providing thoughtfully integrated living space and an unobstructed view overlooking the Red River and West Lake.

stays.name: Hanoi City Backpackers Hostel
stays.address: 55B Bat Su Street, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: It’s ideally located in the very heart of Hanoi Old Quarter, just few minutes walk to the Hoan Kiem Lake, Cathedral, Water Puppet Theatre, Ho Chi Minh Complex, Temple of Literature... There are many highly recommended restaurants, bars, pubs near by

stays.name: SUPER HOTEL Candle
stays.address: 301 287, Doi Can Road, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: We offer luxury, elegant, and comfortable hotel rooms. Flat-screen TVs, personal safes, mini-bars, specially in apartment rooms, we offer modernly equipped kitchens including microwaves, fridges... There are Japanese-style bathhouses, thermal pools, pampering spa with intelligent beauty method and massage, Free Modern fitness center with professional fitness trainers on 3th floor.

stays.name: My Moon Hotel Hanoi
stays.address: 59 Cua Dong Street Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi 111100 Vietnam
stays.about: My Moon Hotel's mission is to provide our guests with a both an unforgettable experience in Hanoi and a welcome warm enough to make them feel as if they've never left home, all with a unique touch different from large international luxury hotels. Our boutique hotel offers an authentic Vietnamese experience, with careful attention to details from our interior design, artwork, and decor, to the homemade fresh breakfast and personalized attention from our staff. The hotel is also perfectly located for discovering traditional Vietnamese restaurants, coffee shops, and bars, as well as attractive boutiques which line the neighborhood lanes around the hotel. My Moon Hotel is conveniently connected to all areas of the city and the city airports, thanks to its proximity to the Dong Xuan traditional market (300m) and to Hoan Kiem lake (1000m).

stays.name: Artisan Lakeview Hotel
stays.address: 23 Hang Hanh St Old quarter, Hanoi 00844 Vietnam
stays.about: Artisan Lakeview Hotel is located on the quiet side of Hoan Kiem Lake in the heart of Hanoi Old Quarter, within immediate vicinity of all the services and the beautiful nature. We provide a pleasant accommodation, a wide range of exciting culinary experiences, and friendly service. This family-owned hotel is well known for its warm atmosphere. Welcome and enjoy a relaxing holiday.Our 15 well-equipped accommodations provide a comfortable setting for staying overnight. The rooms are cozily decorated and well lit, and sure to suit all preferences. Select the alternative that best suits you from double rooms to spacious family rooms and suites. In our pleasant lobby, you can read newspapers or talk with our front desk team to know more about Hanoi.

stays.name: Rising Dragon Palace Hotel
stays.address: 24 Hang Ga St Old Quarter, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: Rising Dragon Grand is located in the heart of The Old Quarter, just a few blocks from Hoan Kiem Lake, Water Puppet Theater and alongside a thriving outdoor market. Along Hang Ga street, you will find cafes, an award-winning spa, pharmacies and various shops and stores carrying clothing, handicrafts, and other amazing finds!

cities.name: Hanoi
cities.info: Hanoi, the country's charming capital has aged well, preserving the Old Quarter, monuments and colonial architecture, while making room for modern developments alongside. The city may have shrugged off several former names, including Thang Long, or "ascending dragon," but it hasn't forgotten its past, as sites such as Ho Chi Minh's Mausoleum and Hoa Lo Prison attest. Lakes, parks, shady boulevards, and more than 600 temples and pagodas add to the appeal of this city, which is easily explored by taxi.

attractions.about: Located on the banks of the poetic Thu Bon River, in central Quang Nam province, 30 kilometers south of Da Nang, Hoi An ancient town is an Eastern oriental classic captivation. With the strategic location on the banks of the great river, with one seaside border (East), it used to be one of the major trading centers in Southeast Asia during the 16th century due to the early western trader occupying period.
attractions.name: Hoi An Ancient Town

attractions.about: Hoi An Night Market, occupying Nguyen Hoang Street in the centre of town, consists of over 50 local vendors selling a variety of local snacks, trinkets, clothing, jewellery, and accessories. Widely regarded as one of the most popular markets in Vietnam, it occupies a 300-metre-long street that overlooks Thu Bon River and is illuminated by hundreds of colourful lanterns, making a popular spot for photography as well.
attractions.name: Hoi An Night Market

attractions.about: Known for A O Show, My Village, Teh Dar, and The Mist, spectacles that charm audience in Saigon, Hanoi, and 4 continents around the world, Lune Production now comes to Hoi An. Our own established venue, Hoi An Lune Center, begins welcoming local and international guests to amazing cultural expreriences from January 2018.
attractions.name: Hoi An Lune Center

attractions.about: Explore different ways to experience this place.
attractions.name: An Bang Beach

attractions.about: A 500m2 display of photos and artifacts collected during the last 8 years of Rehahn's exploration of Vietnam. Entrance for this cultural experience is Free In English, French and Vietnamese
attractions.name: Precious Heritage by Réhahn

attractions.about: Tra Que is a charming little village on the edge of Hoi An, the village is named after the sweet scented vegetables that spice up the everyday meals of the Pho Hoi people. Experience a day of living and working with the local people in Tra Que vegetable village, in which you will have a chance to discover the daily life of farmers.
attractions.name: Tra Que Vegetable Village

attractions.about: Jack's Cat Cafe is Central Vietnam's first cat cafe and homes over 50 rescue cats. You can enjoy coffee, tea, juices and vegetarian food in a beautiful garden setting with all the kitties.
attractions.name: Jack's Cat Cafe

attractions.about: Each of the many animal statues in this stunning meeting hall symbolize some life quality such as wisdom, longevity and nobility; Chinese merchants from the Phuc Kien province built this structure in 1697.
attractions.name: Fukian Assembly Hall (Phuc Kien)

attractions.about: The fresh fish dock and the affordable silk tailors are some high points of this thriving all-day market.
attractions.name: Central Market

attractions.about: A local favorite, construction on this covered bridge began in the Year of the Monkey (1593) and was finished in the Year of the Dog (1595), hence the monkey and dog sculptures at either end.
attractions.name: Japanese Covered Bridge

attractions.about: Tra Que Minty Garden is a local Vietnamese family-run business managed by Le Van Hai, known as Chef Danny, who has more than 16 years in the hospitality industry as a Western Sous Chef and as an Executive Chef. Tra Que Minty Garden specializes in organizing farm-to-table cooking classes, farming and countryside tours.
attractions.name: Tra Que Minty Garden

attractions.about: Explore different ways to experience this place.
attractions.name: Cam Nam Island

attractions.about: Cham islands are 15km from Cua Dai. There are seven islands altogether named according to their shape or characteristics. They are called Lao ( pear ), Dai ( long ), La ( leaf), Kho ( dry ),Tai ( ear ),Mo ( tomb ) and Nom ( East Wind ). They have good climate, cool the year round, trees and animals as well as marine life are plentiful here. On the island, there are precious bird nests while under the water, the coral is marvelous. There are also scenic spots around the island, such as Suoi Tinh ( Love stream), Suoi Ong ( Sir’s stream ), Hon Chong ( Piled up rocks ),Hang Ba ( The lady’s cave ). the island is also surrounded by very nice beaches with clean white sand and transparent, cool water.
attractions.name: Cham Island (Cu Lao Cham)

attractions.about: This beautiful private home, built around an open courtyard and filled with antiques, is over two hundred years old. Facebook : https://bit.ly/2NZLpVb
attractions.name: Old House of Tan Ky

attractions.about: A terracotta miniature park, history and future of terracotta, history of Thanh Ha pottery village, information about other Vietnamese ceramic villages, history of Champ and Sa Huynh culture, special children's activities, educational projects, terracotta market with unique products, the craftsman at work during the week, English guiding, also for big groups and special programs
attractions.name: Thanh Ha Terracotta Park

attractions.about: Cantonese merchants built this meeting hall in Southeast Asian style, with a central courtyard surrounded by buildings brightly decorated with statues and carvings.
attractions.name: Cantonese Assembly Hall

attractions.about: Kim Bong carpentry village is a bright spot for tourists who prefer to just relax away from the noisy town just discovered the Vietnamese countryside. About 10 minutes by boat across from the ancient town of Hoi An, visitors saw firsthand carpentry tradition with sophisticated products, unique. This is where supply sculptor Hue, the ancient temples, Hoi An ancient boats. Feel passing through the village streets, see photos farmers herd the rice fields. Combining ancient city suburb stay and drink coffee with the locals. Experience profession Quang noodles and enjoy it. The grilled fish as you enjoy delicious specialties in Central Vietnam. Remember to spend time gardening morning or experience fishing on the river.
attractions.name: Kim Bong Carpentry Village

attractions.about: Another interesting Hoi An home, this one is constructed using eighty columns; the roof is traditional convex and concave interlocking tiles known as Yin and Yang style.
attractions.name: The Old House of Phun Hung

Step off the street & into our oriental garden, passing the original water well & into the main building with its yin-yang roof & exquisite carvings. More than 250 years old, this building has seen 8 generations living here. When you step inside you will feel the tranquil calmness while enjoying complimentary tea

With elegant neoclassical architecture, sophisticated and luxurious decoration, the hotel occupies the boundary where tradition and innovation meet. The intimate and relaxing atmosphere, the personalized and refined service and the thorough attention to detail make each stay at the La Residencia Hoian an unforgettable experience. Every room and suite, furnished in the classical style, reflects the characteristic comfort and charm of the hotel as a whole, and delivers a superior standard of service including access to the latest technology while offering views of the Ancient Town or Hoai River.

Elements of traditional Vietnamese design combined with modern, luxury styling create an indulgent retreat in our new Trendy Wing which was opened in March 2019. The resort offers 131 modern and luxurious guestrooms, from the elegant, traditional Villa style accommodation to the contemporary and well appointed Duplex Suite. You will experience a true sense of Vietnam’s rich history and culture while being treated to 5 star luxury accommodation and an unparalleled range of guest services including a boutique and an in house tailor.

stays.name: Hoi An Four Seasons Villa
stays.address: Opposite 63 Ly Thai To, Hoi An Vietnam
stays.about: Finding an ideal charming hotel in Hoi An does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hoi An Four Seasons Villa, a nice option for travelers like you.Close to some of Hoi An's most popular landmarks, such as Hoi An Handicraft Workshop (0.6 mi) and Hoi An Photo Day Tours & Workshop (0.6 mi), Hoi An Four Seasons Villa is a great destination for tourists.As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer air conditioning, a refrigerator, and a minibar, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to a concierge and room service while staying at Hoi An Four Seasons Villa. In addition, Hoi An Four Seasons Villa offers a pool and free breakfast, which will help make your Hoi An trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.While in Hoi An be sure to experience local shrimp favorites at Morning Glory Restaurant, Nu Eatery, or Miss Ly Cafe.If you are looking for something to do in the area, Hoi An Ancient Town (0.9 mi) is a popular attraction that is within walking distance of Hoi An Four Seasons Villa.Hoi An Four Seasons Villa looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Hoi An.

stays.name: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
stays.address: An Bang Beach Group 3, An Tan, Cam An Ward, Hoi An 880000 Vietnam
stays.about: Uniquely located right by the white-sand An Bang beach, nestled in lush tropical gardens, lulled by the song of the sea, one will find the ultimate relaxation in our luxury Aira Boutique Hoi An hotel & villa, owned and managed by Aira Hospitality Group (AHG). With 40 luxurious rooms, suites & villa allocated in 2 blocks, a Vietnamese restaurant, a day spa and 2 outdoor swimming pools, Aira Boutique Hoi An offers 4-star facilities served by a dedicated English spoken team. For beach lovers, we provide you with private sun beds, umbrellas and towels on the beach. Besides, there is an array of restaurants, bars and shops nearby to cater to all your need. Water sports are on the beach in front of the hotel and a golf course is 4km away. For those who want to explore the area, the UNESCO-heritage Hoi An ancient town is less than 5km (cycling over there along the rice paddy field is another great experience) and Da Nang international airport is only a 20-minute drive.

stays.name: River Suites Hoi An
stays.address: 4 Nguyen Du Street, Hoi An 560000 Vietnam
stays.about: If you’re looking for a charming hotel in Hoi An, look no further than River Suites Hoi An.Close to some of Hoi An's most popular landmarks, such as Japanese Covered Bridge (0.2 mi) and Lune Performing Center Hoi An (0.4 mi), River Suites Hoi An is a great destination for tourists.River Suites Hoi An offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The hotel offers a concierge and room service, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool and free breakfast.Hoi An has plenty of seafood restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like MIX Restaurant, Anh Boa BBQ & Hotpot, and Lien Thao, which are serving up some great dishes.Hoi An is also known for some great historic sites, including Fukian Assembly Hall (Phuc Kien), Kim Bong Carpentry Village, and Old House of Tan Ky, which are not too far from River Suites Hoi An.The staff at River Suites Hoi An looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

stays.about: Situated between the De Vong river and the sandy Cua Dai beach shaded by palm trees and just a few kilometer from the charming old town of Hoi An, Fivitel Hoi An Hotel is an ideal place to stay. With 80 well-appointed stylish rooms your comfort is guaranteed. Whether you stay in one of our Suites, an Ocean View or a Village View room, you will find nothing lacking.

stays.address: 64 Dao Duy Tu Street, Hoi An 560000 Vietnam
stays.about: Hoi An River Green Boutique Hotel is located right next to Hoai River, you can feel the legendary Hoai River flowing calmly in front. Just 5 minutes stroll to the famous Japanese Bridge (Hoi An symbol), Hoi An River Green Boutique Hotel offers you a relaxing time and is extremely convenient for sightseeing, shopping, dining or exploring the World Heritage of UNESCO: Hoi An Ancient Town and My Son Sanctuary. Hoi An River Green Boutique Hotel - 4 star with 100 deluxe rooms and suites, is elegantly decorated with elegant architecture combining contemporary European and Eastern charm of the Old Town cultural heritage. The design and interior furnishings are astounding with the details of ancient traditional architecture bringing the local culture, ecological environment, harmony between nature and Hoi An people's way of life.

cities.name: Hoi An
cities.info: This city on the central Vietnamese coast is a well-preserved example of the important Southeast Asian trading port it was from the 15th-19th centuries. Already a common stop for backpackers, it is becoming better known to tourists. On the 14th day of each lunar month, the town trades its electric lights for traditional colored lanterns. Sights include the Japanese Covered Bridge and the Quan Cong Temple. Let the town’s expert tailors make you some bespoke clothing.

attractions.about: Situated 56km SE of Nha Trang, this newly developed site includes a reconstruction of Dr Alexandre Yersin's outstation. The building contains items of original furniture transported from the Dr Yersin Museum in Nha Trang, and reproductions of several period photographs. Entrance fee to the historical site is 30,000 dong. On site parking is free.Also on site are: an open sided canteen, and five small chalets for rent at 500,000 dong per night per couple (100,000 dong per additional guest). Electricity is available, but as yet is inexplicably not connected. Hence (1) the canteen menu is limited to dried fish, dried squid and fresh chicken, killed just for you. Tea, coffee, soft drinks and non-refigerated beer are available without ice; (2) the chalets are unheated and without hot water; and (3) small kerosene hurrican lamps are used for lighting.To get here, go 17km from Nha Trang towards Saigon, turn right at Suoi Cat commune at a blue and white tourist sign "Ho Chua Nuoc Suoi Dau", after one km and turn left a market onto the Hon Ba road. Follow this road 38km to Hon Ba peak.A visit to this site would suit history buffs and those just wishing an escape from summer heat in Nha Trang. Good swimming holes are available in the stream at the bottom of the mountain, especially near the Foresty Inspection Station boom gate, 13km from the Suoi Cat turn off.

Located on a separate island in one of the world's 30 most beautiful bays, Vinpearl Nha Trang Resort features as a luxurious, idyllic, romantic and attractive resort . Not only being endowed by the nature with blue sea, white sand, bright sun and lush coconut trees but by the hands and sharp minds of talented people, who created an exquisite design, Vinpearl Nha Trang Resort has become the leading Hotel & Resort Complex in Vietnam. Vinpearl Nha Trang Resort enamors every visitor not only with the international "5 Star" hotel, longest sea-crossing cableway in the world, the best natural beach in Nha Trang or the most modern and largest outdoor swimming pool in South East Asia, but also premium wellness and beauty services and a wide selection of comfortable and luxurious restaurants. Come and let your soul leisurely float in a peaceful nature of Vinpearl Nha Trang, with all senses awakened for a full feel of perfection from every exceptional service and you will know why Nha Trang is indisputably given such luxurious and attractive names as "The tropical paradise", "Brilliant flower basket on the East Sea Coast" or "Vietnamese pearl".

stays.about: Daphovina Hotel is an ideal destination for tourists. It is an international 4-star hotel, which has 20 floors with 135 modern and luxurious rooms. All the hotel's bedrooms are designed in neoclassical architecture. Moreover, all of them have balconies so that it is very cool and you can enjoy the whole romantic beautiful sea view and city view in campus of 1000 square meters. Daphovina Hotel is situated in a prime spot (32 Bac Son, Vinh Hai Ward, Nha Trang, Khanh Hoa Province). It is located in an area where fresh seafood is very well-known. Daphovina Hotel is just a 5-minute ride to the Ana Marina, it is near the surfing area as well as the most modern and beautiful floating park. It’s 50 meters away to the busy shopping center and only 30 meters to the beach in Bai Tien- Hon Chong area- which is considered as one of the most beautiful spots in Nha Trang by foot. In addition, Ponagar Tower- a beautiful ancient architectural site, is just a few minutes away from Daphovina Hotel by foot. Along that road, we can also discover Hang Pagoda (also called Hai An Pagoda) and enjoy the most famous mud bath in Nha Trang. Daphovina Hotel offers high standard services such as a buffet breakfast, a lovely swimming pool and gym and a Sky bar with a view of the entire beach and city. In addition, Daphovina Hotel also offers high-class conference room services, a luxury spa, Terrace coffee with a modern style, luxurious restaurant, 24-hour reception, friendly and polite room service and free Wi-Fi. These services are guaranteed to please tourists.

cities.name: Nha Trang
cities.info: Nha Trang is best known for its beautiful sandy beaches. But visitors will also find amusement parks, mud baths, golf, and the historic Po Ngar temple complex, as well as a variety of hotels and restaurants. Adventurous foodies can sample bun cha ca, a soup made from sailfish and jellyfish, while most everyone can appreciate the region's fresh seafood, noodles, and pancakes, which have mass appeal.

attractions.about: Just as true love has to surpass several obstacles, the Valley of Love in Dalat had to surpass many challenges in the past in order to gain its rightful name today. In the beginning, the valley was called Vallée D’amour (Valley of Love) by the French before being renamed The Valley of Piece. In 1935, its beauty and captivation persuaded people to once again name it after the most wonderful thing in the world: Love. Thanks to being the honeymoon destination of newly-married couples, this valley is even regarded as Niagara Fall of Vietnam. The Valley of Love today is located 4 miles away from the center of Dalat, the little Paris, on Phu Dong Thien Vuong St.

attractions.about: Datanla High Rope Course(HRC) Adventure Parks are an answer to the high demand for active tourism in the Nature. Datanla HRC Parks are an original new way to discover the forest environment. Datanla HRC allow anyone to venture from one tree to another via a series of suspended bridges, nets, walkways, barrels, Tarzan bound, flying fox and other fun challenges. A HRC is composed of 3 to 8 circuits. And each circuit includes 8 to 16 challenges.HRC Adventure circuits are designed with graded difficulty levels at the height of 2 to 20 meters,so participants can progress safely, at their own rhythm regardless of skill. Datanla HRC Adventure Parks are accessible to all whatever their level of agility or experience. With different circuits, everyone can find the right circuits for his level and age, or even try the more challenging circuits. Treetop Adventure Parks receive clients from 4 years old to over 70!
