stays.name: Terrasse des Roses
stays.address: 35 Cao Ba Quat, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: Luxury Boutique Hotel Terrasse Des Roses: A world class hotel in the heart of nature. The Hotel was awarded the most Beautiful Place in town by the Dalat Governor. Terrasse des Roses is a top-class choice for travelers who would like to enjoy the city with a luxury charm.Set 2 km from the excitement of the city, this 4 star hotels is not only the favorite place for Vietnamese Events and Media Industry where many famous movies have been filmed but also an excellent location and provides access to the city's biggest attractions. Terrasse des Roses is located in a large beautiful garden with a variety of flowers bringing to our clients a calming experience and peace of mind.

stays.name: Dreams Hotel
stays.address: 141 & 138-140 Phan Dinh Phung St, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: The Dreams Hotels are situated close to the city centre. A full breakfast and free internet are included in the price. All rooms have bathroom, cable TV, mini bar, AC heater and telephone.

stays.name: Zen Cafe Lakeside
stays.address: Dao Nguyen Village, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: Large, clean and comfortable rooms in the middle of the nature on one of the most beautiful lakes of Vietnam invite you to relax. The rooms are over 40m2, each with 3 panoramic windows, TV, Wifi, a sitting set on the balcony. Also suitable for longer stays. Every daytime and every weather is an experience. The bathroom is generously designed and has under the rain shower a view over the lake.

stays.name: Ana Mandara Villas Dalat Resort & Spa
stays.address: Le Lai Street, Ward 5, Da Lat 61000 Vietnam
stays.about: Seventeen villas line cobble-stone roads and verdant gardens built in the 1920s and 1930s. In the valley below is the French art deco city of Dalat. Beyond are distant mountains, a cool blue sky, and later, a starry night. Ana Mandara Villas Dalat Resort & Spa is well located for you to enjoy exploring the surrounding landscaped areas and local culture and farming countryside. Meticulously preserved and bursting with character, Ana’s villas aim to bring you back to bygone years and forgotten times when a day was spent walking along a grassy knoll or dozing off by a crackling fireplace.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Hai Long Vuong Hotel
stays.address: Lot 6 Tran Le Street Ward 4, Da Lat 61000 Vietnam
stays.about: If you are traveling around the world with a budget. If you are looking a good hotel, cheap prices for stay and if you are looking for an experience to exchange your culture with local Vietnamese In Da Lat.

stays.name: Dalat Sky Hostel
stays.address: 27 Vo Thi Sau, Ward 2, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: Dalat Sky Hostel has developed a unique, fun, family environment with private room and dorm rooms which every detail designed (bright window, free electricity, light, private curtain). It would suit those who are looking for a relaxed, friendly atmosphere and the opportunity to meet new people. You will be greeted by super friendly staff, clean facilities and awesome Bar and Rooftop lounge that will change your image of a hostel. We invite free lunch when you arrive. Family dinner time is also the chance for you learn how to make local food, or you can eat and make friends with crazily friendly friends from all over the world waiting for your arrival in the cozy lobby. Dalat Sky Hostel, located in Dalat City Center, is in a quiet, local neighbourhood with a nice view of the city. Here, you will be able to experience Vietnamese life from inside. It's about 10 minute walk to the central market where can try the local food, go shopping. The hostel is next to coffee places, restaurants, bars, tourist attractions and 2 minutes from the bus station. Tickets / tours are available from reception, as well as laundry

stays.name: Cam Ly Homestay
stays.address: 3/62 Dao Duy Tu Ward 4, Da Lat 760000 Vietnam
stays.about: Hello, my name is Tri and I would love to host you and your friends to visit my beautiful town in the mountains. I have been in tourism for many years and can customize tours to fit your budget. As a previous guide of waterfall repelling/canyoning, rock climbing, Easyrider tour guide and now I have a warm and clean place to invite you to stay at my home ( Private room and Dormitory ). I love to host all nationalities and strive for a five star rating, so let me know how I can help your stay be the best in Da Lat. Things to note & policies: Free Cancellation: 3 Days before the arrival without being charged by the property Check in from 1:00pm Check out Before 11:00am Payment on Arrival: Cash and Credit Card, but extra Charge for credit card service fee. Tax Included.

stays.name: Swiss-Belresort Tuyen Lam Dalat
stays.address: Zone 7&8, Tuyen Lam Lake Tourist Area, Ward 3,, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: Surrounded by hills, Swiss-Belresort Tuyen Lam, Dalat has an exceptional landscape and rural environment. Designed as a botanical garden, it offers an exquisite surrounding for this upscale international resort. Designed in an Anglo-Normand rural style and surrounded by the 18-hole golf course, it is a sight to behold while walking on the fairways.

stays.name: Hotel Dai Loi (Fortune Hotel)
stays.address: 3A Bui Thi Xuan, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to Hotel Dai Loi (Fortune Hotel), your Da Lat “home away from home.” Hotel Dai Loi (Fortune Hotel) aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Close to some of Da Lat's most popular landmarks, such as Linh Son Pagoda (0.4 mi) and Lam Vien Square (0.7 mi), Hotel Dai Loi is a great destination for tourists.You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV and a refrigerator, and you can stay connected during your stay as Hotel Dai Loi (Fortune Hotel) offers guests free wifi.The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and currency exchange. Plus, Hotel Dai Loi (Fortune Hotel) offers free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.Travelers looking to enjoy some tempura can head to Restaurant Ichi. Otherwise, you may want to check out a Mediterranean restaurant such as Primavera Italian Restaurant, Emai Dalat, or The Sky Over Dalat.During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Crazy House (1.0 mi), Thien Vien Truc Lam (1.0 mi), and Dalat Flower Park (0.6 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.Hotel Dai Loi (Fortune Hotel) puts the best of Da Lat at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: Tulip Hotel Dalat II
stays.address: 14 Nguyen Chi Thanh Street, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: Tulip Hotel Dalat II is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Da Lat, offering many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Nearby landmarks such as Linh Son Pagoda (0.6 mi) and Lam Vien Square (0.7 mi) make Tulip Hotel Dalat II a great place to stay when visiting Da Lat.Guest rooms offer a minibar, a refrigerator, and a seating area, and Tulip Hotel Dalat II makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the small hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. As an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.If you like seafood restaurants, Tulip Hotel Dalat II is conveniently located near Fungi Chingu Restaurant, Moulin Rouge, and Ốc Nhé.Da Lat is also home to Dalat Flower Park, a popular garden that is not too far from Tulip Hotel Dalat II.Enjoy your stay in Da Lat!

stays.name: Moonstone Hotel
stays.address: 86 Ly Tu Trong Street, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: Located on Ly Tu Trong street right in the heart of Da Lat city,Moonstone Hotel is 100 metres from Xuan Huong Lake and Dalat Market. Dalat Flower Gardens is 1.6 km away while Truc Lam Temple is 4.6 km from the hotel.The hotel is a 3-star standard hotel with a unique design,luxurious decoration, cozy spaces, full modern amenities and services.Moonstone Hotel is reliable address for you in Da lat

stays.about: Located near the Dalat Train Station, the Dalat Train Villa is a perfect place for short or long stays in Dalat.The villa is a beautifully restored 2-story masterpiece of French colonial-era architecture (1935). Next to the villa is 1910 French train car, which is being renovated into a bar/cafe.Within 10 minutes of most major attractions in Dalat. Very quie.

stays.address: 28/4 Bui Thi Xuan Street, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: iDorm Hostel is located in the center of Da Lat Highland, a beautiful & romantic city in Vietnam. The city is located 1,500m (4,900ft) above sea level with cool weather throughout the year. Location: Dalat City center(800m from Xuan Huong Lake). Facilities: WiFi, Breakfast, TV. *** How to get here: - By Air: Da Lat is serviced by Lien Khuong Airport (DLI), 23km south of Da Lat in Duc Trong district, Lam Dong province. - By Bus: There are a lot of bus services from other cities such as SaiGon, Mui Ne,Nha Trang, Da Nang...

stays.name: The Orchid Villa
stays.address: 120 To Hien Thanh Ward 3, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located downtown Dalat City, Hoa Ngoc Lan - The Orchid villa is a mere 30 minutes drive from Lien Khuong airport and steps away from the main bus station. Offering luxury rooms, the villa is the preferred choice for leisure travelers seeking for first class facilities and relaxing atmosphere rooms.

stays.name: Gold Night Hotel
stays.address: 06 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai Street, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: The Gold Night hotel is located in the center of Dalat, in the heart of the market. Recently we at Gold night hotel have under gone new management and some seriuous renovations of the entire facility. Enjoy your stay in Dalat with new ammedities upholstry and comfortable beds, followed by our own breakfast menu 6:30-9:30 AM The Gold Night hotel offers a variety of services such as laundry, tours, bike/rental, motorbike rental, Ps3 , public T.V and we would be happy to help you and organize any tours nessecary to further enjoy your stay in Dalat Availability of accommodations are Dormitory styles New mattress/bedding in a private setting 2 full bathrooms Private room 2 star hotel service Double/twin/tripple rooms offered all at an affordable rate.

stays.name: Maxim Hotel
stays.address: 39 Nguyen Thi Nghia Ward 2, Da Lat 650000 Vietnam
stays.about: If you’re looking for a family-friendly small hotel in Da Lat, look no further than Maxim Hotel.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Da Lat, Maxim Hotel is located a short distance from Lam Vien Square (0.5 mi) and Dalat Railway Station (1.0 mi).Guest rooms offer a kitchenette, a minibar, and a fireplace, and Maxim Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the small hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.If you’re looking for a barbeque restaurant, consider a visit to Wooden House, Chu Quan Bbq Grill, or Fungi Chingu, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Maxim Hotel.Should time allow, Crazy House and Thien Vien Truc Lam are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.The staff at Maxim Hotel looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

If you are driving to Saigon - Dalat, free parking is available.Close to some of Da Lat's most popular landmarks, such as Bao Dai's Palace (0.5 mi) and Linh Son Pagoda (0.9 mi), Saigon - Dalat is a great destination for tourists.While in Da Lat be sure to experience local oyster favorites at Da Quy Restaurant.During your visit, be sure to check out Crazy House (0.2 mi), which is a popular attraction within walking distance of the hotel.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Saigon - Dalat as you experience everything Da Lat has to offer.

stays.name: La Sapinette Hotel Dalat
stays.address: 01 Phan Chu Trinh Street, Ward 9, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: La Sapinette Hotel Dalat is a 4 star hotel just build in Dec 2009, 91 well appointed with French Art Nouveau design included 32" LCD TV, Safe box and bath tub in all rooms, three-minute car ride from the central market.Guests can enjoy the cozy and tranquil atmosphere with 02 restaurant for Vietnamese and European cuisine, Gym, Spa and night chit chat at the Bar On the Rock.

stays.name: Bich Dao Boutique Hotel
stays.address: 8 Trieu Viet Vuong Ward 4, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: Newly renovated and under new management, Bich Dao Boutique will deliver a sense of ease, relaxation and enjoyment in nature that you would find in no other place within Vietnam. Bich Dao Boutique Hotel is located in Da Lat, the Little Paris of Vietnam. Built on the same hill that King Bao Dai chose to claim his third palace, the villa is set in gentle, romantic surroundings. Besides our elegantly designed guest-rooms, we also offer a variety of services for your utmost comfort. We believe Bich Dao Boutique will be your one true memorable destination of relaxation and satisfaction.

stays.name: TTC Hotel - Ngoc Lan
stays.address: 42 Nguyen Chi Thanh Street, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: Greetings from beautiful Dalat city ! Dalat, the city of Eternal Spring, with its wonderful climate and famous natural beauty spots, has become the summer resort of Vietnam, the romantic honeymoon destination and the marriage anniversary rendezvous for decades. Perfectly located in the heart of Dalat with stunning views of the picturesque Xuan Huong lake, Ngoc Lan hotel has been a favourite amongst travellers to Dalat. Guests to the hotel can now enjoy the completely new and luxurious hotel with the exquisite warmth and hospitality brought by the attentive and professional staff. The hotel is the perfect place for conducting both leisure and business. The guest services are always ready, and the meeting and banquet facilities are well equipped to cater to your every need.

stays.name: Binh An Village Dalat
stays.address: Tuyen Lam Lake, Ward 4 Plot Number 6, Area 162, Da Lat 61000 Vietnam
stays.about: Created as an intimate boutique resort, Binh An combines contemporary interpretation of French and local tribe heritage architecture. The interior design of Binh An Village Resort's villas and suites is inspired by different flowers. Surrounded by fragrant flower gardens, every villa or suite allows guests to enjoy maximum exposure to Tuyen Lam lake view or to beautiful pine forests.

stays.name: Sam Tuyen Lam Resort
stays.address: Zone 7&8, Tuyen Lam Lake, Ward 3, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: Overlooking the Tuyen Lam Lake, SAM Tuyen Lam Resort offers a peaceful retreat from the bustling city. Guests can enjoy their meals at the on-site restaurant. With free WiFi access, most rooms have lake/garden views and parquet floors. Each has a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

cities.name: Da Lat
cities.info: This former colonial resort provides a respite from Southern Vietnam's year-round swelter. The town is full of beautiful French-era buildings and surrounded by pine trees and farms growing exotic vegetables and flowers. It's worth the trip just to escape the heat for a few days.

attractions.about: Vinpearl Safari Park – Vietnam’s largest wildlife conservation park . Nestled in Bai Dai, the Northwest coast of Phu Quoc Island, Vinpearl Safari Park, boasting to be Vietnam’s largest zoological park, conserve abundant indigenous and exotic flora and fauna. The sanctuary is home to 400 species of plants, and 2000 wild animals representing 130 different species, many of which are considered rare a

stays.about: Offering unparalleled luxury and refinement in Phu Quoc, InterContinental Phu Quoc Long Beach Resort is surrounded by verdant jungle matted hills and landscaped gardens overlooking the azure ocean. The resort features a series of private low rise and sky tower accommodation, many featuring landscaped gardens, patios, direct access to the white sandy beach and magical daily sunsets.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Movenpick Resort Waverly Phu Quoc
stays.address: Ong Lang, Phu Quoc Island 920000 Vietnam
stays.about: Step into paradise at the 5-star Movenpick Resort Waverly Phu Quoc, located on Ong Lang beach on the west coast of the island. Whether you are looking for a family adventure, a romantic getaway or a group incentive trip, you will find everything you need right here at our family lifestyle resort. Our culinary team invite you to explore the restaurant, bars and beach club offering our signature dishes, innovative cocktails and of course the famous Movenpick “Chocolate Hour”. Relax by the pool, unwind with a massage, embark on a culinary journey and simply enjoy the tranquil surroundings. We can guarantee you will have a memorable island experience. No trip to Phu Quoc would be the same without experiencing the spectacular sunsets so sit back, sip and savor the breathtaking view. The Residence and The Villas are located within the resort. Please check out Movenpick Residences Phu Quoc for more details. At Mövenpick Resort Waverly Phu Quoc, we make moments.

stays.name: Cassia Cottage
stays.address: KP7 Du_ng Tr_n Hung D_o, Duong Dong, Phu Quoc Island 92000 Vietnam
stays.about: Named the BEST HOTEL ON PHU QUOC 2018 and TOP 10 BEST HOTELS 2018 WORLDWIDE by Northern European travel companies, Cassia Cottage is a place where guests can truly switch off and unwind. This boutique beach resort features 58 tastefully furnished rooms and cottages. All are complete with all the amenities of a premium hotel, aside from a television. Large open spaces, lush gardens of spices and flowers, together with warm genuine local hospitality lend Cassia Cottage its hallmark relaxing and carefree ambiance; making it a meditative sanctuary where the modern pace of life washes out to sea.

stays.about: Vinpearl Discovery Coastalland Phu Quoc - the charming 5-star resort on the largest island in Vietnam, travelers will definitely fall in love with its modern and exquisite architecture distinguished by luxury interior design primarily using wood colors, as well as the superior quality of professional services.

stays.address: Bai Xep, Ong Lang, Cua Duong, Kien Giang,, Phu Quoc Island 920000 Vietnam
stays.about: Nestled discreetly in a secluded bay surrounded by a tropical rain forest, Chen Sea Resort & Spa invites you to lay down. This exclusive hideaway offers spectacular view over the South Gulf of Thailand. Chen Sea Resort & Spa lies perfectly along a private and pristine beach offering privacy and serenity, everything is about peace and heaven. The Architecture of the Resort is inspired by the local environment with the use of natural material that is traditional to Vietnam. Chen Sea Resort & Spa offers 36 unique and spacious Villas. The open plan layout design invites our guests for both indoor and outdoor experience. Traditional oriental simplicity and refinement are the inspiration for the design and furnishings of all the villas.

A smart, cool and natural resort concept that will invite you to immerse yourself in the laid back mood, enjoying every moment of your holidays by the pool, on the beach or getting a massage in the Body & Sol spa. DINING EXPERIENCE Enjoy our dining experiences in The Kitchen with an international buffet or a-la-carte menu with garden views, Ola Beach Club with seafood Mediterranean-style cuisine and DJ sunset sessions, or Shack offering gourmet snacks and healthy juices.

With an attractive Mediterranean design style, some villas boast private pools, and all come with sea views, right next to Vinpearl Golf course.

stays.name: Pullman Phu Quoc Beach Resort
stays.address: Group 6, Ban Quy hamlet, Duong Bao area, Duong To, Phu Quoc Island 920000 Vietnam
stays.about: Pullman Phu Quoc Beach Resort, a Pullman's flagship resort located on the island's southwest coast just 10 minutes from the airport, is tailor-made for those searching for serious play and a lively place to work. Along its private 170-meter beach on Bai Truong, the resort offers a variety of 331 rooms in 8 categories, bespoke culinary options with three restaurants and three bars and state-of-the-art facilities include the largest mosaic infinity pool (2000sqm) of the island, Pullman Fit and Spa, kids' playground, a complete line-up of lifestyle activities, making our world the fun-static playground for any purpose.

stays.name: Radisson Blu Resort Phu Quoc
stays.address: Ganh Dau Beach, Phu Quoc Island 920000 Vietnam
stays.about: Nestled in a serene seafront setting on Phu Quoc’s idyllic northwest coast, Vietnam’s first Radisson Blu resort overlooks white sands, azure waters and verdant mountains. Guests are offered a choice of 514 rooms, suites and villas, ranging from 43 to 635 square meters, all featuring a contemporary design, private balconies or terraces, high-end amenities and cutting-edge technology including complimentary Wi-Fi. All guests will enjoy views over the resort’s tropical gardens, pool, water park, mountains or sea. The ten beachfront villas promise stylish and purposeful living, with two, three or six bedrooms, large living areas, full kitchens, dining areas and private outdoor pools - perfect for getaways and special occasions. Located off the country’s south coast, Phu Quoc is Vietnam’s largest island and one of Asia’s most exciting up-and-coming tourist destinations. Resort facilities include an inviting lagoon-style infinity pool, a Kid’s Club, plus four innovative F&B outlets.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.about: Vinpearl Discovery Greenhill Phu Quoc is a secluded seaside retreat with a romantic ambiance and art deco design influence, next to a pretty nature reserve; with villa stays, including some with private pools, nestled along a mountainous landscape gently sloping down to the blue sea at Bai Dai Beach on the beautiful island of Phu Quoc off Vietnam’s south coast. The area also boasts Vinpearl Land amusement park, Vinpearl Golf and Vinpearl Safari as well as a convention center and casino complex.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Salinda Resort Phu Quoc Island
stays.address: Cua Lap Hamlet, Duong To Commune, Phu Quoc Island Vietnam
stays.about: With a dedication to providing outstanding hospitality, Salinda Resort is a five-star boutique resort, located on the prime location on Phu Quoc Island with stunning views on romantic sunsets. The resort features 121 luxury rooms, suites and villas designed in contemporary style with added local touch that creates an almost seamless transition from the inside out, all whilst being surrounded by the elegance and simplicity of the island’s natural environment. Salinda Resort has three unique restaurants with its distinctive venue concept and specialty Head Chef; and an authentic Thai spa with signature treatments, such as the pearl massage or warm herbal compress that pays tribute to Phu Quoc Island natural ingredients and ancient Thai wellness secrets. An infinity salt-filtrated pool near a private golden beach overlooks breathtaking sunset, sprinkled with palm trees that cast a natural shade. Surrender to the allure of island life at Salinda Resort!

stays.address: Ganh Dau Commune Bai Dai Area, Ganh Dau, Phu Quoc Island 91000 Vietnam
stays.about: Boasting a bold, solid design, an outdoor pool of 800 square metre and a robust supply of 687 rooms, at a highly competitive rate, Vinholidays Fiesta Phu Quoc is the ideal choice for vacation for families, f riends and large tourist groups.Located at the heart of the Grand World Complex and adjacent to Vinpearl Phu Quoc Cluster, Vinholidays Fiesta Phu Quoc inherits a 5-star ecosystem with diverse entertainment and shopping, which bring the majority of Vietnamese people closer to their dream vacation at one of the most beautiful destinations in the country.

stays.name: Green Bay Phu Quoc Resort & Spa
stays.address: Cua Can Hamlet, Ong Lang, Phu Quoc Island Vietnam
stays.about: From the moment we first walked through an uninhabited tropical forest on Phu Quoc Island and discovered a pristine beach in a secluded coral bay boasting panoramic views across the Gulf of Thailand, we were inspired to create Green Bay Resort. We immediately had a vision of an eco-conscious, five-star boutique resort that nurtured the natural beauty of one of the secluded Vietnam beaches. Our goal was to develop a world class resort in Phu Quoc without disturbing the island’s enchanting, rustic aura. Our luxurious lodgings incorporate natural and sustainably-sourced materials while featuring all of the modern amenities that guests would expect from a superlative boutique holiday experience . Every day you will see a team of gardeners carefully maintaining the bucolic beauty throughout the resort. Each and every detail throughout our resort – from the serene setting of our spa through the restaurants and to the infinity pool bar that overlooks a pristine shoreline and the turquoise waters of a coral fringed-bay, guests will appreciate how Green Bay Resort strives to protect its most precious asset: the natural beauty of Phu Quoc Island.

stays.about: Planning an escape from the hustle and bustle in the city or a business trip to Phu Quoc? At Dusit Princess Moonrise Resort Phu Quoc we believe in providing everyone with everything they need to work, relax, and enjoy their stay. Located on Long Beach, only minutes away from the international airport and City Centre, guests will enjoy our modern approach on style and comfort.

stays.name: Fusion Resort Phu Quoc - All Spa Inclusive
stays.address: Vung Bau Beach, Cua Can Ward, Cua Can, Phu Quoc Island Vietnam
stays.about: When we at Fusion think of “getting away from it all”, Fusion Resort Phu Quoc is the kind of place we imagine (and then build). With private pools and secluded gardens outside each and every one of our spacious thatched villas, plus a stunning beachfront, mouth-watering dining options, a “breakfast anywhere, anytime” concept, and a premium spa facility offering Fusion’s unique “all-spa inclusive” service, it really is the kind of place to disconnect, switch off, and put the rest of the world on hold for a few days or weeks at a time. Located in a private bay in the north of one of Vietnam’s most breathtaking tropical islands, with both ocean and river-front views, Fusion Resort Phu Quoc is the ideal getaway for couples, families, and groups of friends looking for a down-to-earth five-star experience without the fuss and formalities of a traditional “luxury” hotel or resort. We’ve got fun and games for the kids, an ocean-facing cocktail bar and a secluded adults-only pool for the grown-ups, plus an enormous infinity pool by the beach for all. Phu Quoc is famous for its freshly caught fish, so we’ve also created one of the best seafood restaurants on the island.

stays.name: JW Marriott Phu Quoc Emerald Bay Resort & Spa
stays.address: Kem Beach, An Thoi, Phu Quoc Island Vietnam
stays.about: As the story goes, the mythical Lamarck University or Lam U was named after the French scientist Jean Baptiste Lamarck and was devoted to the study of all things natural until it was closed in 1975. Fortunately, Lam U has been resurrected to her former glory by the vigorous entrepreneurs of Vietnam's Sun Group and the starchitech, Bill Bensley in the form of JW Marriott Phu Quoc Emerald Bay. This hotel in Phu Quoc, Vietnam is unlike any other hotel or resort in Vietnam. It features 5-star luxury, a quirky style and an unparalleled location on the pristine beaches of Phu Quoc.

Beautifully designed and inspired by the colonial styles of the past, the boutique resort is for those who love the Phu Quoc island ambience and the tranquility that a tropical beach setting brings.

Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.The rooms offer a minibar, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.The Palmy Phu Quoc Resort & Spa features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. In addition, as a valued The Palmy Phu Quoc Resort & Spa guest, you can enjoy a pool and free breakfast that are available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.While in Duong To be sure to experience local ribs favorites at CAMI Restaurant & Bar.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at The Palmy Phu Quoc Resort & Spa as you experience all of the things Duong To has to offer.

This upscale beach resort features 246 superior rooms and Suites, 80 Deluxe Twins, 40 bungalows, 96 villas, 3 restaurants, 3 bars, 4 swimming pools, 2 spas, 2 kids room, 2 tennis courts, ballroom and meeting facilities.

stays.name: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort Managed by AccorHotels
stays.address: Ong Doi Cape, An Thoi, Phu Quoc Island 920000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located at the southern end of Phu Quoc Island, Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort Managed by Ac offers 217 villas with private swimming pool, 2-4 bedrooms and spacious living room with kitchenette. Stretching across the peninsula, our villas are built at different heights from the sea level, categorised into Island Villas, Beachfront Villas, Ocean View Villas and On The Rock Villas. Guests can enjoy the expansive swimming pool and various activities at this paradise, such as kayaking, paddling, biking or simply finding the best spot to contemplate dawn and dusk. Those looking for a calm piece of mind can find themselves on a relaxation journey at Plumeria Spa. Diverse culinary options range from our casual all-day-dining restaurant The Market, the elegant Mediterranean Restaurant Corallo, to the swim up Pool Bar, cozy Deli cafe and convenient Grocery store.

stays.name: Lahana Resort Phu Quoc
stays.address: 91/3 Tr_n Hung D_o, Duong Dong, Phu Quoc Island 920000 Vietnam
stays.about: Boasting a high standard of eco-friendly natural greenery at Duong Dong’s hilltop, Lahana Resort Phu Quoc provides a spacious and luxury retreat with a large outdoor infinity swimming pool, the nature fall along the hill and spa. Spectacular view of either ocean or mountain can be enjoyed from the resort. All accommodations with air-condition equipped are nicely eco-friendly nature decorated and provided private terraces. The resort’s bungalows are nestled within spectacular boulders at the foot of the mountain and the cool natural wind breezes from the ocean through the wooden balconies. Situated at Duong Dong, the Downtown of Phu Quoc Island, Lahana Resort Phu Quoc is 7 km from the Phu Quoc International Airport, and 1.5 km from Phu Quoc night market. Moreover, since located at middle point of the Island, transportation to Northern and Southern can be easily to reach some popular attractions such as Sao Beach, Coconut Prison, Streams, Safari park..

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Peppercorn Beach Resort
stays.address: To 8, Ap Chuong Vich, Ganh Dau, Phu Quoc Island Vietnam
stays.about: Peppercorn Beach is a family-run boutique resort located in the tranquil northern shores of Phu Quoc island, offering a truly unique experience just a few steps from a quiet and almost deserted beach with breathtaking island views.

stays.name: The Shells Resort and Spa Phu Quoc
stays.address: Ganh Gio Beach, Duong Dong, Phu Quoc Island Vietnam
stays.about: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Duong Dong, The Shells Resort and Spa Phu Quoc is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the resort. The Shells Resort and Spa Phu Quoc features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and breakfast. If you are driving to The Shells Resort and Spa Phu Quoc, free parking is available. Nestled on the pristine tear-shaped Island, The Shells Resort & Spa beachfront resort in Phu Quoc brings guests into a truly relaxing & party atmosphere. Contemporary and minimal in design driven by the shell-shaped concept, open and harmonious with nature, The Shells pictures a serene and peaceful landscape where nature and human are one and ‘hustles and bustles’ is not in the dictionary of our guests. Life at the Shells Resort & Spa is fulfilled with various activities from diving the reefs, kayaking in the bays or just living the life of a lotus eater by lounging on the beach, Indulging in a massage or embrace in our party ambiance with themed gourmet dinner on fresh seafood. Come and unveil the Beauty in the Hidden Gem. Come and unveil the Beauty in the Hidden Gem.

stays.name: Sea Star Resort
stays.address: 98/2 Tran Hung Dao Street, Duong Dong, Phu Quoc Island 950000 Vietnam
stays.about: Sea Star Resort Phu Quoc is situated on the beautiful Long Beach, offers simple and comfy accommodation with free WiFi access in its public areas. The resort is proud to have the nicest stretch of Long Beach with natural shade from Malabar almond and coco trees. It was designed its rooms and bungalows with respect for the environment and sensitivity to local culture, a combination designed to give our guests a peaceful and rewarding experience. We strive to exceed the expectations of our guests in every facet of our service. This means bigger rooms with spacious veranda, genuine local hospitality, complete tranquility and excellent value for money. Trip for leisure, recreation and holiday purposes, Sea Star Resort is an excellent choice for your stay in Phu Quoc Island.

stays.name: Isabella Resort
stays.address: Ong Lang Beach, Ong Lang, Phu Quoc Island Vietnam
stays.about: See why so many travelers make Isabella Resort their hotel of choice when visiting Ong Lang. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning and a minibar, and you can stay connected during your stay as Isabella Resort offers guests free wifi.Plus, Isabella Resort offers an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.While in Ong Lang, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Isabella Resort, including Bittersweet Bistro - Cocktail. Food and Music (0.3 mi), Sunrise Bar (0.3 mi), and Bird of Paradise (0.4 mi).Ong Lang is also home to Phu Quoc Gallery of Contemporary Art (GoCA), a popular art gallery that is not too far from Isabella Resort.At Isabella Resort, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Ong Lang.

cities.info: Soak up the sun and some Vietnamese culture on Phu Quoc Island, where white sands and tropical waters entice beachgoers from all over the globe. Snorkeling, scuba diving and fishing are the most popular water sports here, though jet-skiing, wind sailing and squid fishing—yes, squid fishing—are also at your vacationing fingertips. Check out the early-morning Duong Dong Market for an authentic local experience.

At the 120km distance from Ho Chi Minh City, HO MAY PARK is an ideal destination so that you can go sightseeing, relax and have happy and comfortable moments with your family and friends. This place is one of the famous tourist attractions in Vung Tau as well, it is favored by many domestic and foreign tourists. HO MAY PARK is a population of various landscapes in combination with many different forms of tour such as: ecological tour, spiritual tour, cultural tour, tour of entertainment, relaxation…If Ho May is considered as other Ba Na within Vung Tau, it is because the way to Ho May is rather special.

stays.name: The Imperial Hotel & Resort Vung Tau
stays.address: 159 Thuy Van Street, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: The IMPERIAL Hotel and Resort is the first and the only 5-star hotel & resort with its own private beach and fabulous Beach Club in Vung Tau city. Situated on its own stretch of private sandy beach in the seaside resort town of Vung Tau, The IMPERIAL Hotel and Resort is truly an art boutique hotel, completely unique in concept and design. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you. Rooms at The Imperial Hotel and Resort Vung Tau offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free WiFi. Room service and a concierge are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool and free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to The Imperial Hotel and Resort Vung Tau, free parking is available with 24 hours security surveillance. Close to some of Vung Tau's most popular landmarks, such as The Vung Tau War Heroes Shrine (0.4 mi) and The Whale Temple (0.8 mi), The Imperial Hotel and Resort Vung Tau is a great destination for tourists. If you’re looking for a steakhouse, consider a visit to RuSeasons restaurant-club or Riviera Restaurant, which are all conveniently located a short distance from The Imperial Hotel Vung Tau. Should time allow, Thich Ca Phat Dai is a popular historic site that is relatively easy to get to. We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at The Imperial Hotel and Resort Vung Tau as you experience all of the things Vung Tau has to offer.

stays.name: The Wind Boutique Resort
stays.address: B10, 84 Phan Chu Trinh, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: Escape to modern luxury in a peaceful, tropical setting. The Wind is Vung Tau's only Spa Inclusive Resort. We offer personalized service in a space that’s beautiful, peaceful, and surprisingly upscale. Our cliff-side location, waterfalls, and beautiful tropical gardens make The Wind Boutique Resort one of a kind. Our rooms are tastefully decorated and fully equipped with the finest items - modern kitchens, 50” LCDs, and leather couches. Every room is unique and has been carefully designed for your comfort. Relax amongst our multiple waterfalls while the children play in the pool, or enjoy a romantic evening while you take-in the city lights from our cliff overlook bar. And of course we offer high speed internet everywhere on the property, so you’re only as removed as you wish to be. Our other facilities include an outdoor pool, steam room, sauna, billiards, jacuzzi, pool bar, and children's shallow swimming area. We have a free shuttle service to the shops, beaches, and amenities around town, and we’re within 5 minutes walk to a selection of restaurants nearby. Front beach is 1.1km while back beach is 1.8km.

stays.address: 6/11 Nguyen Du, Phuong 1, Thanh Pho, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: See why so many travelers make Lotus Apartment Hotel their small hotel of choice when visiting Vung Tau. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.As your “home away from home,” the small hotel rooms offer air conditioning, a kitchenette, and a refrigerator, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge while staying at Lotus Apartment Hotel. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.Nearby landmarks such as The Vung Tau War Heroes Shrine (1.1 mi) and The Whale Temple (1.5 mi) make Lotus Apartment Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Vung Tau.Vung Tau has plenty of steakhouses. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Riviera Restaurant and RuSeasons restaurant-club, which are serving up some great dishes.If you are interested in exploring Vung Tau, check out a park, such as Tao Phung Park.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Lotus Apartment Hotel as you experience all of the things Vung Tau has to offer.

stays.name: Fusion Suites Vung Tau
stays.address: 02 Truong Cong Dinh Ward 2, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: Fusion Suites Vung Tau brings originality and a wellness inspired hotel to the seaside town of Vung Tau. It has set a new trend with 170 stylish suites, studios and apartments with expansive ocean and mountain views. Featuring daily spa treatments at no extra cost, yoga classes, fitness center, 8 uniquely designed sky pools and a rooftop infinity pool. You can enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner in the 19th floor restaurant "Fresh" with 360 degree views or indulge in a few cocktails in the best rooftop bar in town "Breeze". The ground floor features “Fusion Courtyard" with a café, weekend burger bar, bubble tea station and wine shop. Fusion Suites also offers banquet meeting rooms for up to 240 people. Only 2 hours drive from Saigon by road or direct ferry, Fusion Suites Vung Tau is ideal for families, couples, groups and solos looking to swap urban bustle for coastal calm without involving a trip to the airport. If you are looking for a modern hotel in a great location with exceptional food and beverage outlets, premium spa and a friendly team - then Fusion Suites Vung Tau is your destination!

attractions.about:
LeBaDang Art Foundation is located at 15 LeLoi_Hue  by Perfume Riverside.

There are 400 works and collections exhibited and stored in two floor of Foundation.

When you come in to LeBaDang's space, you will be admire a  new world, unique and impression. His art works mostly make full use of various color with impressive , soulful and vital languages on various materials, innovative and novel. His works not only drawn on paper, but also sculpture, carved and creates a variety of unique models by inox, wood, stainless steel, American B52 wreck, metal and concrete.

LeBaDang's Art is a lissome and elegant beauty combination of two Eastern and Western cultures.

We are friendly, enthusiastic, dynamical and profession staffs will bring to the visitors  feel attractive and impressive when admiring and discovering LBD's contemporary Art.

The LeBaDang Art foundation hope will be the ideal destination for visitors!!!!!

stays.name: Alba Spa Hotel
stays.address: 29 Tran Quang Khai St., Hue Vietnam
stays.about: Alba Spa Hotel is located in the heart of Hue, just some minutes away from Perfume River, and within walking distance to flight ticketing offices. The hotel has 58 rooms well equipped at 4-star service. As a unique feature, you can indulge yourself in large 12-seater hot and cold baths filled with famous Alba hotspring mineral water which has proven therapeutic benefits for body and skin followed by massage and spa treatments conceived by our French spa consultant Florence Jaffre. In addition to free wifi, conference room, parking and bar, the Madam Chau restaurant is offering tasty Western and Vietnamese dishes from our Chef's a-la-carte list or set menu list. If you stay several days in Alba Spa Hotel, please pamper yourself in our Alba Hot Springs Resort, where activity rhymes with serenity. Let our precious mineral hot springs and outdoor activities such as zipline, high wire course, wave pool, traditional crafts, etc... At our Fitness and Wellness parks bring you in-depth detox and rejuvenation for your body and mind.

stays.address: 50A Hung Vuong Street, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Centrally located in Hue, walking distance to the Perfume River, Vinpearl Hotel Hue offers the ideal accommodation to travellers visiting Hue. Located on top of the Vincom Mall, guests are sure to be in the center of it all.

stays.address: 16/7 Nguyen Cong Tru, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Our hotel is situated on the bank of the tranquil and picturesque Nhu Y River, embedded in the background of the legendary Thon Vy village well noted in our national poetry for its charming rural landscape. From the hotel’s windows here you may admire the fishersmen’s activity and even hear the soft, curious clacking sound they make trying to frighten the fish into their nets.

stays.name: Hue Four Seasons Hotel
stays.address: 6/9 Lane 7 Nguyen Cong Tru Street, Hue 47000 Vietnam
stays.about: Finding an ideal charming small hotel in Hue does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hue Four Seasons Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.Guest rooms offer a refrigerator, a minibar, and air conditioning, and Hue Four Seasons Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the small hotel, including a concierge. In addition, guests can enjoy free breakfast during their visit.Nearby landmarks such as Huyen Tran Princess Temple (0.2 mi) and Tu Dam Pagoda (0.6 mi) make Hue Four Seasons Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Hue.If you’re looking for a French restaurant, consider a visit to Les Jardins de La Carambole, COCOCLUB, or La Boulangerie Francaise, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Hue Four Seasons Hotel.If you’re looking for something to do, Phu Mong Garden House and Hue's Garden Houses are a nice way to spend some time.Hue Four Seasons Hotel puts the best of Hue at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: The Scarlett Boutique Hotel
stays.address: 17/1 Ben Nghe Street, Hue Vietnam
stays.about: See why so many travelers make The Scarlett Boutique Hotel their boutique hotel of choice when visiting Hue. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a boutique setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.The Scarlett Boutique Hotel is a boutique boutique hotel offering a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The boutique hotel features a concierge and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy breakfast, which has made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Hue.Close to some of Hue's most popular landmarks, such as Huyen Tran Princess Temple (0.2 mi) and Hue Royal Palace (0.5 mi), The Scarlett Boutique Hotel is a great destination for tourists.While in Hue be sure to experience local tempura favorites at Take Japanese Restaurant.There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular architectural buildings such as Thien Mu Pagoda and Dieu De Pagoda.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at The Scarlett Boutique Hotel as you experience all of the things Hue has to offer.

stays.name: EMM Hotel Hue
stays.address: 15 LY Thuong Kiet Street, Hue 47000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located on Vietnam’s central coast, the UNESCO World Heritage-listed city of Hue is just a 20-minute drive from Phu Bai International Airport. Nestled in the heart of the former imperial capital, ÊMM Hotel Hue is the ideal base to discover Hue’s fascinating history and unique culture with the Perfume River and the Hue Citadel just a few minutes’ walk away.

stays.name: Charming Riverside Hotel
stays.address: 5 Lane 27 Nguyen Sinh Cung Street, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Charming Riverside hotel is located in the heart of Hue city, within walking distance of the ancient Truong Tien Bridge overlooking the timeless Huong River, divided by the quaint Hen Islet...The highlights of Charming Riverside hotel include savouring authentic Hue cuisine in our restaurant at the terrace of the hotel, standing here you can have an overall view of Huong river and the city.

stays.name: Hue Serene Palace Hotel
stays.address: 21/42 Nguyen Cong Tru street, Hue 0084 Vietnam
stays.about: A brand new hotel that features luxurious rooms and suites. We offer convenience to our guests by providing modern elevators, restaurants, and other great amenities. Offering fantastic value of money, It is located right in the heart of ancient Hue City , in lovely and small lane ,only a few minutes' walk from Huong River, and lavishly decorated with modern furniture.

stays.name: Azerai La Residence Hue
stays.address: 5 Le Loi Vinh Ninh Ward, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Step back in time to Art Deco's golden age with a stay at Azerai La Residence, Hue. Nestled along the fabled Perfume River and overlooking the imposing Imperial Citadel - once home to Emperors and now preserved as a UNESCO World Heritage Site - La Residence is a one-of-a-kind masterpiece. Endowed with opulence and warmth, this former residence of the French "Resident Superieur" has been painstakingly restored and refashioned into an enchanting luxury boutique hotel with 122 guestrooms and suites, which offer visitors the chance to relive the pleasures of a bygone era. Food is a passion at Le Parfum Restaurant. Visitors will delight in a fusion menu of Vietnam and Europe's very best culinary traditions. Allow yourself to be swept away with the signature cocktails "La Residence Monsieur and La Residence Madame" in the cozy ambiance of Le Gouverneur Bar. Indulge yourself in our award-winning Spa and relax by the large saltwater swimming pool overlooking the river.

stays.address: 7/3 Chu Van An, Hue Vietnam
stays.about: Offering quality accommodations in the sightseeing, restaurants, culture district of Hue, Sunny Fine Guesthouse is a popular pick for both business and leisure travelers. The excitement of the city center is only 1.3 km away. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

stays.name: La Paix Hue
stays.address: No. 8, Lane 139 Nguyen Sinh Cung Vy Da, Hue 53000 Vietnam
stays.about: Nestled in the peaceful Vi Da hamlet, on the banks of Huong River, La paix Hue is born with a passion to offer warm experience to all guests from different parts. You can enjoy the riverfront while having some drinks or breakfast at the Fig Tree Restaurant. Rooms feature wooden or enamel tile flooring. Each room comes with private bathroom and satellite TV. A mini bar and a work desk are also provide

stays.name: Canary Boutique Hotel
stays.address: Number 8 Lane 43 Nguyen Cong Tru Street, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Canary Boutique Hotel is carefully designed to be built with wood with a system of two layer windows and balcony doors which are soundproof in a maximum distance and absolutely safe. The room arrangement following the Eastern Asian science of winds and waters give you the most pleasing and tranquil feeling when you are in the room, in the very heart of Hue city.

stays.name: Jade Hotel
stays.address: 43 Hung Vuong, Hue 0543 Vietnam
stays.about: The Jade Hotel is ideally located in the heart of the city on Hung Vuong Road, one of the best shopping streets in Hue. Take off to the end of Hung Vuong to the famous Huong 'Perfume' River and historic Truong Tien Bridge with its magical 7-light changing show each evening. Under the bridge, you can visit the night market, riverside cafes and restaurants, stroll through the beautiful riverside park, and visit the art gallery and University of Hue. The Jade Hotel is certified as two-star by Hue Tourism 2015. It is tastefully decorated and comfortably furnished with sound-proofed windows ensuring our guests feel safe, comfortable and undisturbed while viewing the vibrant city below. Our friendly and professional staff are at your service to meet your travel and accommodation needs with the enthusiasm and charm that is famous in Hue. To serve you is our pleasure. Your satisfaction is our reward.

stays.name: Phong Lan (Wild Orchid) Guesthouse
stays.address: Number 12 Lane 66 le Loi Street Number 12, Lane 66 le Loi Street, Hue +84 54 Vietnam
stays.about: Looking for a place to stay in Hue? Then look no further than Phong Lan (Wild Orchid) Guesthouse, a charming guest house that brings the best of Hue to your doorstep.Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Phong Lan (wild Orchid) Guesthouse Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the guest house, including a 24 hour front desk and baggage storage.Close to some of Hue's most popular landmarks, such as Huyen Tran Princess Temple (0.0 mi) and Hue Royal Palace (0.6 mi), Phong Lan (wild Orchid) Guesthouse Hotel is a great destination for tourists.While in Hue, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Phong Lan (wild Orchid) Guesthouse Hotel, including Hanh Restaurant (0.3 mi), Elegant Restaurant (0.1 mi), and Nook Cafe & Bar (0.4 mi).Best of all, Phong Lan (wild Orchid) Guesthouse Hotel makes it easy to experience many great Hue attractions like Thái Hoà Palace and An Dinh Palace, which are some popular castles.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Phong Lan (Wild Orchid) Guesthouse as you experience everything Hue has to offer.

stays.name: Thanh Lich Royal Boutique Hotel
stays.address: 33 Hai Ba Trung Vinh Ninh Ward, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Thanh Lich Royal Boutique Hotel is a 4-star standard hotel, features its 105 well-appointed Deluxe rooms and Suites, located at the center of Hue city. The Hotel owns an ideally location in Hue City. The tourists enjoy staying here will get deluxe products of well harmony combination between modern and traditional of Hue’s cultural characters. The decoration is elegant, featuring a distinctive Authentic Vietnamese theme that provides a restive ambience, perfect for travelers who want a relaxing and pleasant holiday. Thanh Lich Royal Boutique Hotel offers elegant and comfortable accommodation with free WiFi access in the entire property. Located just 5-minute drive from Citadel. Fitted with wooden flooring, air-conditioned rooms include a safe, wardrobe, seating area, a minibar and a flat-screen Smart TV with cable multi-channels. All Rooms and suites enjoy city’s panoramic views, and come with a private bathroom equipped with bathtub, hairdryer and free toiletries.

stays.address: 36 Chu Van An Street, Phu Hoi Ward 36 Chu Van An, Hue, Vietnam, Hue 53000 Vietnam
stays.about: Rosaleen Boutique Hotel is situated in the heart of Hue City, less than 5 minutes’ walk from the Perfume River. The Hue Ferry Terminal is a 10-minute walk away. Rooms at Rosaleen Boutique Hotel are spacious and modern. They enjoy fresh, light decor and offer satellite TV and tea and coffee makers. Many rooms feature a balcony with a city view.

stays.name: Cherish Hotel
stays.address: 57 Ben Nghe Street, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Cherish Hotel includes 11 floors with 98 well-equipped and comfortable rooms, created from stone, brick and Padouk wood. The hotel was designed sensiblly and elegantly in order to bring a relaxing private and comfortable space to guests.

stays.address: 59 Vo Thi Sau, Phu Hoi Ward, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Thanh Lich Hue Hotel is located in Hue about 800 metres away from Dong Ba Market. Rooms are well-appointed and bright. Guests also enjoy free WiFi access throughout the property. Each room at Thanh Lich Hue Hotel comes furnished with air conditioning, large windows with direct sunlight, a mini-fridge and a flat-screen cable TV. Bathroom facilities are en suite. All the rooms offer panoramic city views.

Private bathroom also comes with slippers. Extras include bed linen and a fan. - At Khe Sanh Home Stay you will find a 24-hour front desk and a snack bar.

stays.about: Amigo Hotel is strategically located in the center of Hue, the 15 rooms hotel is well-equipped rooms with Cable TV, Air-Con, Mini-bar, Bath-tube (hot/cold shower), telephone, ADSL Wi-Fi, etc.

stays.address: 7/64 Nguyen Cong Tru Phu Hoi, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Designed for both business and leisure travel, New Valentine Hotel is ideally located in Hue City; one of the famous areas of the city. Right in the city center and 0.3 km from the pedestrian street, customers will get good accommodation to enjoy the interesting and popular activities here. The hotel offers a complete innovation compared to the interesting places in the city such as Dong Ba market

stays.name: Than Thien Hotel - Friendly Hotel
stays.address: 10 Nguyen Cong Tru Street, Hue 84054 Vietnam
stays.about: Located right in Hue City center, Friendly Hotel offers best service for your stay. Than Thien means Friendly, it is also the Character of our Hotel. Distance to famous places in province:- Dragon Boat on Huong Rive Port: 100m.- Truong Tien Bridge: 700m. Hue Railway Station: 1,5Km- Dong Ba Market: 1,2Km. Hue Citadel: 1,5Km.- Thien Mu Pagoda: 4,0 Km. Tu Duc King Tomb: 8Km- Thuan An Beach: 12Km.

cities.name: Hue
cities.info: Hue is clustered around the Perfume River, which splits the capital of the Nguyễn Dynasty in two. There are endless must-see historic sites, especially those that are UNESCO World Heritage designated. Sightseeing can include the ornate Imperial Citadel, colorful Thanh Toan Bridge, royal tombs and the Forbidden Purple City. Spend a moment in quiet contemplation if you visit Hue Jungle Crevice, where thousands of citizens were pushed to their deaths.

attractions.about: Southeast Asia is usually associated with a wet, tropical environment, but, in the area of Mui Ne, Vietnam, lays a beautiful desert. white sandunes is 50km away from mui ne central ,the city of Mui Ne is four hours from Ho Chi Minh City, in the south of the a further 45 minutes,and you arrive at Bau Trang, Bau Trang, or the White Sand Dunes, is one of the only desert areas in Southeast Asia and is a beautiful expanse of dunes and sand. There are no camels here; instead, shepherds herd cows through the sandy expanse. Perhaps the most striking part of the area is a small lagoon covered in lotus flowers. Beside the lake, there is also a small pine forest that makes the wind cool, even in the hot Asian desert.
attractions.name: White Sand Dunes

attractions.about: Inspired from the charming Napa Valley of the US, Sea Links City proudly introduces its first Castle in Mui Ne and ever in Vietnam. The authentically-styled, Western-prototyped castle, breathtaking views abound at every turn – mustard in picturesque rolling hills planted with vineyards year-round of every stature dot the landscape of the Sea Links City. Whether you are wine tasters or visitor at the Castle, refreshing the soul of yourself with the unique circling of the medieval style architect with light and cozy atmosphere makes RD Wine Castle the premium destination in Mui Ne for Passionate Travelers and Wine Connoisseurs. Enjoy a tour of tasting senses throughout the Castle. We can’t bring to you the Napa Valley but we are sure to deliver the premium standing tasting technique for your winery experience. For Connoisseurs and Wine Lovers, sips after sips of Chardonnay, Sauvignon, Cabernet Sauvignon and more no doubt leaves you tipsy moments and endless gossiping hangouts.

attractions.about: Mui Ne Museum is an interactive museum of local old fishing village. You will be guided with a documentary film and your group can have very nice photos taken along the 1600m2 area.

stays.name: The Cliff Resort & Residences
stays.address: Zone 5, Phu Hai Ward, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located in the prime location of Mui Ne, The Cliff Resort & Residences is a brand new 4-star plus resort complex offering a majestic oceanfront setting with breathtaking views and sophisticated services. Situated on a 3-hectare picturesque piece of land, The Cliff consists of: 128 rooms with 95% sea view (beachfront bungalows, panoramic sea view condos & penthouse, beachfront villas with private swimming pool) - meeting room for up to 200 people - Vista Restaurant managed by famous Hoang Yen Restaurant Group - luxurious Zest Spa - The Den Entertainment: mini-cinema, karaoke, billiards, ping-pong... - Recreational facilities include 2 outdoor swimming pools, fitness center and a variety of beach sports: jetski, kayak, kite surfing, wind surfing...Business category: 4-star plus Resort & Residences. Employees in Vietnam: 250

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Bamboo Village Beach Resort & Spa
stays.address: 38 Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Ham Tien Ward, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: A popular destination for couples and honeymooners, the multi-award winning Bamboo Village Beach Resort & Spa has won the love and trust of travelers from around the world for the past 18 years as “Home of the Blissful Bamboo Villager.” Bamboo Village Beach Resort & Spa incorporates 147 authentic Vietnamese rooms and bungalows wallowing in green, tropical gardens filled with bamboo trees and tropical plants. The white sandy beaches lie in harmony with the blue ocean and stretch into the coconut palms where cabanas and two sunlit swimming pools lie beneath their shadow. This is the venue for the superb Strawy restaurant, acclaimed by diners who enjoy meals seasoned by oceanic and local flavors, from buffet breakfast delicacies to late evening snacks and dinners of delicious Vietnamese food accompanied by live musical entertainment. The Escape Bar offers splendid view of the lagoon and a calming place to enjoy a cocktail. The Water Lily Spa offers treatments from Switzerland, Bali and Vietnam using the best of beauty and healthcare products and the skilled and friendly masseuses are trained to professional international standards. Yoga classes are offered daily in the specialized yoga studio with a wooden floor and floor to ceiling glass overlooking the peaceful Zen garden. The special feature of this resort is the friendliness, helpfulness and good humor of the staff.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

Situated on a 3-hectare picturesque piece of land, The Cliff consists of: 128 rooms with 95% sea view (beachfront bungalows, panoramic sea view condos & penthouse, beachfront villas with private swimming pool) - meeting room for up to 200 people - Vista Restaurant managed by famous Hoang Yen Restaurant Group - luxurious Zest Spa - The Den Entertainment: mini-cinema, karaoke, billiards, ping-pong... - Recreational facilities include 2 outdoor swimming pools, fitness center and a variety of beach sports: jetski, kayak, kite surfing, wind surfing...Business category: 4-star plus Resort & Residences.
