property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Cham Villas
stays.address: 32 Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Cham Villas was created by a German-Vietnamese couple and opened in September 2004. Set in one hectare of lush tropical gardens, Cham Villas is a place to get away from the hustle and bustle, to chill out and be pampered. Tranquility, friendly service and privacy are the attributes of a perfect holiday. By integrating artefacts representing Vietnam's historic Cham era into the design of the garden and villas, the resort creates a unique atmosphere of total detachment and relaxation. Cham Villas is "Traveler's Choice Winner 2014" in the categories "Romance" and "Small Hotels" and was selected "Vietnam's Finest Hotel" in 2009 by Vietnam Travel.

stays.name: Sailing Club Resort Mui Ne
stays.address: 24 Nguyen Dinh Chieu Ham Tien, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Sailing Club Resort Mui Ne is a small and exclusive boutique resort located on pristine beachfront in the heart of laid-back Mui Ne, in the Binh Thuan province. Sailing Club Resort Mui Ne is a luxe, sustainability-minded oasis of tranquillity and comfort; a true haven of tranquillity and relaxation for couples and families alike! Please note no pets allowed at this resort.

stays.name: Victoria Phan Thiet Beach Resort & Spa
stays.address: Km 9, Phu Hai,, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: The Victoria Phan Thiet Beach Resort & Spa is everything that the other hotels in the area are not. It is secluded, peaceful, elegant and welcoming. It's a resort where the needs and wishes of the guest have been put first - Simple touches like free sunscreen at the pool, a top-notch kids club that caters for kids of all ages, and a "butler" service to take care of everything guests need. We use our Victoria heritage to offer a special experience at the seaside village - not just another few days in a lounge chair but a real feeling of being in Vietnam. We take care to share genuine local experiences, culture and cuisine with our guests. From a romantic white tablecloth picnic on the dunes to an early morning accompanied trip to the fish market along with our chef.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Anantara Mui Ne Resort
stays.address: 12A Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Ham Tien, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Set on Mui Ne’s pristinely sweeping beach, Anantara Mui Ne Resort & Spa is an oasis of elegance and comfort offering a unique and unforgettable way to experience the southern coast of Vietnam. Mornings spent by the sea. Afternoon hikes through nearby sand dunes. A soothing spa treatment before starlit evening drinks on the beach.Expertly blending Vietnamese tradition and legendary Anantara service, Anantara Mui Ne Resort & Spa offers a tropical retreat, worlds away from Vietnam’s urban bustle. Take in the splendour of the sunset from the pool deck. Sample fine international dining and mouth-watering cuisine at our restaurants, some of the best Mui Ne resorts have to offer. Wander down garden paths to your own private villa. A cherished holiday within a setting to remember forever in our exceptional Vietnam hotel.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Shades Resort
stays.address: 98A Nguyen Dien Chieu Mui Ne, Phan Thiet 620000 Vietnam
stays.about: Shades Resort offers a selection of 10 well appointed rooms, 1 outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi access. All rooms have Ocean or Pool Views. Complimentary breakfast is served daily overlooking the beautiful Mui Ne Bay Within a short walk from restaurants and bars, Shades is a 10 minute drive to the Red Sand Dunes, fishing Village, local Ham Tien market, and a 20-minute drive to Phan Thiet City. It is a 45-minute drive out to the White Sand Dunes and a 4 hour drive from Tan Son Nhat International Airport. After Our recent refurbishment we can offer King Beds, marble bathrooms with rain shower showers. At the reception, don't hesitate to ask for any assistance regarding motorbike hireage, kite surfing schools and our local cooking school. Laundry and luggage storage services are also available. On-site parking is free. Send us an email today so we can tailor your next break to Mui Ne especially for you. Check out our Tripadvisor Specials!!!

stays.name: Diem Lien Guesthouse
stays.address: 85 Huynh Thuc Khang, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Finding an ideal charming guest house in Mui Ne does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Diem Lien Guesthouse, a nice option for travelers like you.Guest rooms offer amenities such as a refrigerator, a minibar, and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the guest house.Diem Lien Guesthouse features a 24 hour front desk, room service, and express check-in and check-out, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a lounge. If you are driving to Diem Lien Guesthouse, free parking is available.For those interested in checking out Linh Long Tu Temple (2.3 mi) while visiting Mui Ne, Diem Lien Guesthouse is a short distance away.While visiting Mui Ne, you may want to try some falafel at one of the nearby restaurants, such as El Cafe Vegetarian Food.If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Mui Ne Harbor (1.0 mi), which is a popular attraction amongst tourists, and it is within walking distance.Diem Lien Guesthouse puts the best of Mui Ne at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: Villa Aria Muine
stays.address: 60A Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Phan Thiet 62000 Vietnam
stays.about: The Newest Boutique Beach Resort in Muine

stays.name: Mui Ne Hills Villa Hotel
stays.address: 69a Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Ham Tien, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Mui Ne Hills Villa Hotel is very centrally located on Nguyen Dinh Chieu 69, just 300 meters uphill from the main road. We opened in October 2010 and completely finished a fabulous renovation end 2018. This is our boutique hotel withonly 19 very cozy rooms. Mui Ne Hills Villa Hotel has a beautiful swimming pool, 2 sun decks with plenty of lounge chairs to chill out and a bar. All rooms have A/C, cable T/V, minibar, hairdryer, safe and free WIFI. Fantastic views over the bay of Mui Ne are guaranteed from either the swimming pool and some of the rooms. The warm-hearted Mui Ne Hills hospitality combined with the stunning views and peaceful surroundings will ensure an absorbing experience conducive to rest and relaxation. A short 10 minutes walk will take you to the BEST part of the white sandy beach of Mui Ne. Breakfast, lunch and dinner is served at 100 meter distance in our famous BREEZE Restaurant & Bar whilst a fresh ocean breeze relaxes the mind continuously. The exclusive settin

stays.name: Pandanus Resort
stays.address: 3 Nguyen Huu Tho adjacent to the Red Sand Dunes, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet 801107 Vietnam
stays.about: Built in 2004 within a ten hectare lush tropical garden on a three hundred metre long beach, the Pandanus Resort in Mui Ne has a large range of facilities and a variety of different accommodations, all designed to make your stay relaxing and enjoyable. Adjacent to the long, sandy beach is a huge free-form pool, surrounding an island covered with coconut palm trees. The buildings are designed to complement, not compete with the natural surroundings. The beach is serene and disturbed only by an occasional fisherman in a round pitch basket, or a wind and kite surfer.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: An Can - Delight Hotel
stays.address: 109B Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: An Can - Delight Hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Phan Thiet, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Close to Forgotten Land Sand Sculpture Park (2.5 mi), a popular Phan Thiet landmark, An Can - Delight Hotel is a great destination for tourists.An Can - Delight Hotel offers guests an array of room amenities including air conditioning and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The small hotel offers a concierge, to make your visit even more pleasant. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Phan Thiet's popular ribs restaurants such as Joe's Cafe and Hill's Smokeria restaurant and bar, all a short distance from An Can - Delight Hotel.During your visit, be sure to check out a popular  like Van Thuy Tu Communal House, which is a short distance from the small hotel.Enjoy your stay in Phan Thiet!

stays.name: Mui Ne Hills Bliss Hotel
stays.address: 69b Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Ham Tien, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Mui Ne Hills Bliss Hotel opened early 2015 and completely renovated in 2020 is very centrally located in Mui Ne just 300 meters from the BEST part of the beach, up a small hill, overlooking the whole bay of Mui Ne, It is designed for the luxury traveller longing for a perfect place to unwind completely. We also house the famous BREEZE Restaurant & Bar for your perfect wining and dining experience

stays.name: Xin Chao Hotel
stays.address: Nguyen Dinh Chieu 129, Phan Thiet 62000 Vietnam
stays.about: Xin Chao Hotel is a small family run hotel with restaurant/bar facilities and very friendly staff. 20 beautiful appointed rooms with ensuite bathroom, air-conditioning, flat screen tv and very clean. We have a choice of Villa or Pool rooms, standard ,deluxe, twin or triple. In the courtyard garden there is a beautiful clean swimming pool to relax and we offer free high speed wifi for guests. The reception area is perfect to lounge, read a book, watch tv, play pool or just simply have a chat with other guests. Prices at Xin Chao Hotel are seasonal. We hope to welcome you soon!

stays.name: Phu Hai Beach Resort & Spa
stays.address: Km 8, Nguyen Dinh Chieu Street Phu Hai ward, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam
stays.about: Phu Hai Resort is located on three hectares of landscaped tropical gardens leading to a private beach with pristine sand and unspoiled water, the four stars Phu Hai Resort boasts French-style architecture infused with traditional Vietnamese heritage and nature local materials. Accommodation comprises of 74 Deluxe Rooms and 38 Luxurious Villas with the most modern amenities. All are well appointed and offer a balcony or terrace, air condition, telephone, mini bar, television LCD, safety box, hair dryer ... The Vietnamese style villas combine with subtle modern French architecture nestled under the green trees. The outdoor swimming pool is designed with soft curves, surrounded by umbrella canopy and full of life flower-garden.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Muine Bay Resort
stays.address: Quarter 14, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam
stays.about: If what you're looking for is a peaceful and quiet beauty in Phan Thiet, look no further than Muine Bay Resort. The hotel lies 7 kms from the city center and provides easy access to the city's must-see destinations. The facilities and services provided by Muine Bay Resort ensure a pleasant stay for guests. Guests of the hotel can enjoy on-site features like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, 24-hour room service, facilities for disabled guests, express check-in/check-out. High quality room facilities with Traditional Champa style design bring an unique experience. The nearby breath- taking destinations like The Prince's Castle, Red Sand Dunes and Fairy Stream; Muine Bay Spa; Wedding Planning; Gala Dinner and other Beach activities will give you unforgettable moments when staying at Muine Bay Resort. "Gorgeous rooms, green landscape, relaxing taste of ocean and every detail reflexes the sense of Champa… Can't imagine those single things could be connected marvellously in Muine Bay Resort"

stays.name: Mui Ne Hills Budget Hotel
stays.address: 69, Nguyen Dinh Chieu Street Ham Tien, Ham Tien, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Mui Ne Hills Budget Hotel (previously Mui Ne Hills 2) is very centrally located on Nguyen Dinh Chieu 69, just 300 meters off the main road, up a small hill. Opened in 2011 and completely renovated in 2019, we provide nice and comfortable accommodation. Always against unbeatable room rates which makes it a perfect deal for travelers on a tight budget. All our rooms have A/C, cable T/V, minibar, safe, wifi and ensuite bathrooms with hot showers. Nestled on the sand dunes of Mui Ne - located at Ham Tien / Mui Ne - the beautiful Mui Ne Hills Budget Hotel provides the ideal location in Ham Tien. A short 10 minutes' walk will take you to the BEST part of the white sandy beach of Ham Tien in Mui Ne. Guests can enjoy a refreshing dive in the lovely swimming pool or rent scooters to discover the area around Mui Ne. The Mui Ne Hills team will always go the extra mile to ensure a perfect stay with us.

stays.name: Hung Phuc Mui Ne Hotel
stays.address: 55 Huynh Thuc Khang, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to Hung Phuc Mui Ne Hotel, your Mui Ne “home away from home.” Hung Phuc Mui Ne Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Close to some of Mui Ne's most popular landmarks, such as Mui Ne Harbor (1.3 mi) and Linh Long Tu Temple (2.6 mi), Hung Phuc Mui Ne Hotel is a great destination for tourists.Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Hung Phuc Mui Ne Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.Mui Ne has plenty of cafes. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Dong Vui Square, Bar17 Kiteburek, and Cafe Lubu, which are serving up some great dishes.Hung Phuc Mui Ne Hotel puts the best of Mui Ne at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: Cocosand Hotel
stays.address: 119 Nguyen dinh chieu, Phan Thiet 119 nguyen Vietnam
stays.about: A Friendly family in Mui Ne, running a chilled out, happy, and helpful guest house with beautiful surroundings that is located in the heart of Mui Ne, just a stones throw away from the beach and all of the vibrant local amenities.

stays.name: Amaryllis Resort & Spa
stays.address: Hamlet 5 Phu Hai Ward, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Amaryllis Resort & Spa is located 5 minutes away of the city of Phan Thiet. It is well-known for its authenticity with the turquoise blue of the South China Sea. The philosophy of the resort is to spend time on the terraces immersed within a second ocean: the ocean of coconut trees. Of these terraces, the view is impressive & calming. This is the ideal place to relax & to sunbath.

stays.name: Herbal Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 21 Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: The hotel is 5 minutes walk to the beach. Herbal Hotel and Spa is located on the Main Street of Mui Ne, 100 m across the street from the beach. It welcomes guests with soothing spa treatments, sauna, massage and hair care and free internet access. It also houses an on-site a seafood and Vietnamese restaurant for breakfast, lunch and dinner with air condition dinning and a second floor open terrace, Also a mini-market for guests’ convenience. Rooms are clean and fully air-conditioned. Each will provide you with a balcony overlooking the garden, a seating area, minibar and coffee maker, there is also a fresh en suite bathroom featuring a hairdryer and bathroom slippers. Herbal Hotel & Spa houses a 24-hour front desk with luggage storage space. Staff can assist you with currency exchange services and laundry/ironing services. You can also unwind at the sauna facility or enjoy a traditional massage on-site. The accommodation is 100 meters from c2sky Kite boarding school which is considered one of the best schools in Mui Ne. Guests can enjoy local Vietnamese and popular Western cuisines at the on-site restaurant. In-room dining options are possible. This is our guests' favorite part of Mui Ne, according to independent reviews. We speak your language

stays.name: Allezboo Beach Resort & Spa
stays.address: 8 Nguyen Dinh Chieu St, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam
stays.about: Allezboo Resort which is located along a stretch of white sandy beach in Mui Ne, is a magnificent tropical paradise. Its location is an approximate 3-hour drive from Ho Chi Minh City Vietnam . With breathtaking views of the ocean and surrounded by the lush, natural and private landscapes, Allezboo Resort is an ideal place for relaxation, and is a perfect getaway from the stresses of modern life. Allezboo Resort offers exotic comfort and luxurious accommodation including 2 Beach Pool villas and 55 suites and deluxe rooms. All accommodations have private balconies, offering spectacular views of the ocean and beautiful "jungle style" landscaping.

stays.name: Bao Quynh Bungalow
stays.address: 26 Nguyen Dinh Chieu Street, Ham Tien Ward, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam
stays.about: Bao Quynh Bungalow is family owned and operated accommodation services. It is our pleasure to invite you to put your worries aside and let us ensure that your time with us is peaceful and relaxed. Our 45 full equipped bungalows and room will provide you a garden oasis amidst the tranquil beauty of a carefully tended garden by the sea.

stays.name: LongSon MuiNe Backpacker Paradise
stays.address: 706 Hon Rom Long Son, Suoi Nuoc, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam
stays.about: The property is right on the beach and has plenty of space to relax with lounge chairs directly on the beach, comfortable couches throughout, and a cozy shaded campground perfect for peace and quiet. LongSon MuiNe Backpacker's Paradise is located between the White and Red sand dunes, 14km from the centre of Mui Ne on the best beach in the Mui Ne area. Both the dorms and tents have a beautiful view of the sea or garden. There are multiple shared bathrooms on this property so you never have to wait to use one. There are individual lockers, free wifi, free parking, a general shop, laundry service, bus service, local tours, and surfing available at the property. You can play pool, volleyball, beer pong, as well as many other daily activities organized for your enjoyment. Full 24/7 reception, bar, and restaurant serving Vietnamese and international dishes. We have daily $1 deals on food and drink, and on Friday all beds are $1 except A/C. If you're afraid we're too far from the town, we have a local bus available from 06h00 to 20h00 to go to and from the centre of Mui Ne, or even further to Phan Thiet with stops in-between such as the Fairy Stream, Red Sand Dunes, Fishing Village, and many more! This property is also rated as the best value in Mui Ne with guests getting more for their money compared to other properties in this city, our slogan is #JustADollar after all.

stays.name: Muong Thanh Holiday Mui Ne Hotel
stays.address: No 54, Huynh Thuc Khang Str., Group 4, Ham Tien Ward, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Sunsea Resort
stays.address: 50 Nguy_n Dinh Chi_u Ham Tien Ward, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to SUNSEA RESORT! SUNSEA RESORT is located on the tranquil and relaxing golden sand beach, full of charm of Mui Ne, 200 km east of Saigon. It has an ideal location: on the first part of Mui Ne Beach, clean, large and quiet to allow yourself the best relaxing experience on the sun loungers under the coconut trees of the resort or in the breeze under the sun. In addition to this privileged location SUNSEA RESORT is close to many restaurants, bars, shops, massages, spas; you have also bicycles, motorbikes, water sport equipment for rent and kite surf lessons at walking distance. SUNSEA RESORT features 2 swimming pools, one in front of the pool view rooms and one infinity pool located on the beach.

stays.name: Lotus Village Resort
stays.address: 100-139D Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam
stays.about: If you’re looking for a charming resort in Phan Thiet, look no further than Lotus Village Resort.Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the resort.Lotus Village Resort features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and free breakfast. If you are driving to Lotus Village Resort, free parking is available.Phan Thiet has plenty of seafood restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like BiBo, Deja Vu Restaurant, and Seafood restaurant Mr Crab, which are serving up some great dishes.Should time allow, Ho Chi Minh Museum is a popular history museum that is relatively easy to get to.The staff at Lotus Village Resort looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

stays.name: Aroma Beach Resort & Spa
stays.address: Quarter 5, Phu Hai Ward, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam
stays.about: New Resort, with high quality facility, full-equipped amenities, high standard in design, beautiful beach, wide swimming pool with 5 luxury cabanas

stays.name: Green Organic Villas
stays.address: 547 Thon Ti_n Phu. Xa Ti_n Thanh, Phan Thiet 62000 Vietnam
stays.about: Green Organic Villas is a very special place for perfect family or romantic escape.Why?Only seven villas in a few steps from the ocean what creates intimate atmosphere and gives personal sincere attention to each guest•Each villa is designed in amazing architecture and modern comfort standards• special location which allows to be in just 15 minutes from the city center of Phan Thiet, but avoid crowded beaches, noisy neighbors and all the disadvantages of intrusive tourist zone• 2 swimming pools .• Enclosed green garden • Farm Restaurant is the first restaurant in Vietnam that offers farm-to-table dining with fresh and original mix of Asian, Italian, French and Mediterranean cuisine• Open air movie theatre with huge screen, ocean breathe and gourmet wine selection• Green Organic Villas is more than hotel,this is a life stile.Welcome to our small haven!!!!

stays.name: Unique Mui Ne Resort
stays.address: 20B Nguyen Dinh Chieu Street, Ham Tien Ward, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Muine Unique Resort offers elegant resort residence in 64 luxury rooms and penthouses beautifully decorated in European contemporary styles. Designed to take advantage of the stunning surrounds, all accommodation overlooks the tropical garden, sandy beach, and azzure ocean.Guest contacts for accomodation support at any time shall be greatly appreciated as we always seek to optimise your Muine Unique experience and make your stay as comfortable as possible.Unique Mui Ne Resort & Spa is a 4-star resort with 64 rooms facing to the Ocean which was opened in September 2011. The Resort has infinitive swimming pool, children playground, private beach, beachfront restaurants and bar, Spa, various water sports and meeting room catering up to 160 pax which can guarantee our distinguished guests a fabulous stay and successful event.
